Groundbreaking advances in synthetic biology achieved at Amyris allow us to create products that are better and safer for humans and more sustainable for the planet. The Digital group is charged with creating connected experiences and back-end services to catapult our several consumer brands to global significance and impact. Today  we serve Biossance  Pipette and Purecane. Among other projects  we are building two new brands that will launch later this year.

We are creating a clean cosmetics line in partnership with Rosie Huntington-Whitely to launch on a new Rose  Inc. platform. We are creating a clean hair care brand  JVN Hair  in partnership with Jonathan Van Ness. We recently acquired Terasana and Costa Brazil.

We are looking for a Sr. or Lead Data Engineer to join the growing Amyris Digital team. Reporting to the VP of Data this person will play a central role in advancing all aspects of our data management system. This includes playing a major role in the development of Amyriss next generation data platform.

Responsibilities
Define and maintain optimized data models and pipelines
Assemble and munge data sets across multiple sources and systems
Build out Analytic tools that help stakeholders understand our operations and customers
Create tools and data sets to assist other technical and non-technical groups within the company
Mentor and lead junior members of the team
Create and update internal system documentation

Required Qualifications
Bachelors degree in Computer Science  Engineering  Physical Science  or related field
4+ years of experience building out robust production ready data services and platforms
Expertise in SQL  data lakes  data warehousing  and ETL systems
Expertise in at least one major programing language beyond SQL (Java  Python  C++  etc.)
Experience working with big data and associated systems
Familiarity with best practices and processes for managing PII and access rights management
In depth knowledge of creating solutions on at least one of the large public cloud providers: AWS  GCC  or Azure
Experience working within Salesforce  Domo  or other modern Analytic platforms
Ability to discuss projects and systems with all members of the company

Preferred Qualifications
Masters/PhD. in Computer Science  Engineering  Physical Science  or related field
7+ years of experience building out robust data services and platforms
Experience with stream processing systems
Experience building out automated data QA system
Experience with: KPIs  Analytics  Reporting  Dashboards  or Data Science solutions
Experience in creating well thought out data models
History of running data centric and/or data management projects
Ability to manage stakeholder discussions

About Cobblestone

Cobblestone Energy is an independent trading firm. Founded in 2017  we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. Although we have experienced very strong growth so far  we are still near the start of our journey. We have ambitions to go a lot further.

Energy in one form or another is fundamental to almost all the world's economic activities. By understanding the demand  supply  and logistics of these commodities  we can better understand the world.

We specialise in the proprietary trading of the short-term wholesale electricity markets across Europe. We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making  trading enough electricity every day to power a small country and growing every day. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.

Over the years we have grown organically. As part of our journey to be the best in all markets we enter  we would like to welcome a Data Engineer into our team. They will already be on a successful career path and looking to take the next step with increased responsibility and be a part of our growth story.

Cobblestone Values:
Lifelong learning with continuous reflection
Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas
The team is more important than the individual
Being the best in any market we enter
Hiring and keeping only the most effective people
Others must benefit from our existence.

Job Description

At Cobblestone Energy we are on a mission to build the most advanced European electricity trading and analytics platform  with our technology being used by our teams of commercial traders to create significant value. Being the Data Engineer of our team  you will work on exciting challenges that come with large-scale data processing  automation  and analytics. We work in an agile and highly collaborative environment and challenge the norms of traditional business leadership. We are looking for enthusiastic and resourceful engineers who are passionate about building highly reliable and performance data processing solutions. You want to help the commercial team make data-informed decisions  have a curious mindset  and are motivated to understand our business better. Developing a strong domain knowledge of our industry over time is key to long term success in this role.

This is a rare opportunity to take a leading role in the growth of a major player in the European Electricity Markets. We are looking for someone who would be committed to the long-term success of the business. We operate in the European Energy markets  but our commercial trading operations are in Dubai  UAE. This role is either remote or onsite. Work shall be done from your home country with periodic travels to Dubai in which case Cobblestone Energy shall handle all visa and paperwork issues on your behalf.

We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our Tech team at Cobblestone Energy. You will be responsible for building our data pipelines and you will be also participating in setting the right Infrastructure and developing the needed tools for our Analytics.

If you have excellent data engineering skills  strong problem-solving skills  and a passion for developing applications utilizing cutting edge technologies  then we would like to meet you.

Job Location:

It can be in our Dubai office or remotely with periodic travel to Dubai

Office Location:

Jumeirah Business Centre 2  Cluster V  Jumeirah Lake Towers  Dubai  United Arab Emirates

Responsibilities
Gather and address technical and design requirements.
Architect our data platform & develop real-time apps ingesting large volume of data and processing messages real-time.
Handle all our data pipeline and contribute towards our data strategy and its execution.
Architecting  building  testing & managing our data platform infrastructure from data collection all the way to data processing & data storage.
Develop  customize and manage integration tools  monitoring tools  databases  warehouses  and analytical systems.
Support the developers through training and transfer of knowledge.
Participate in the entire application life-cycle mainly focusing on coding  debugging  and testing.

Requirements
BSc degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering. Masters is a plus.
Strong competencies in algorithms and software architecture.
3+ years of experience in Python.
2+ years of experience as a Data Engineer.
Strong experience in real-time data processing and data ingestion.
Strong experience in batch data processing and data pipelines.
Strong work experience in AWS Kinesis Services and building apps utilizing it is a must.
3+ years of experience in developing APIs (REST & SOAP protocols).
2+ years of experience in using AWS cloud and its resources/services.
Strong experience in Relational Databases (MySQL  SQL Server or PostgreSQL) and non-relational databases (Mongo DB or Cassandra. etc.)
Strong knowledge in Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) utilizing Docker containers.
Strong knowledge in Pandas & NumPy libraries is a big plus.
Strong knowledge in workflow orchestration tools (Airflow etc.) is a plus.
Experience in Java is a plus.
Previous experience in automated testing including unit testing & UI testing is a plus.
Strong in-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design  development  and deployment)
Excellent analytical  time management and teamwork skills.

Some videos for your reference:

Who is Elexon? For the UK market  they are the system administrator.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5j-S6VGqpw#action=share

Some general information about electricity trading arrangements in the UK

https://youtu.be/UDv04q3U6e0

Elexon sushi video. Tries to explain the balancing of the UK's electricity grid

https://vimeo.com/65768597

The videos above are UK centric  but our current interest is Europe wide. Feel free to research the other markets. This is a longer video that to me explains why there is such large opportunity going forward for the electricity traders who are able to efficiently analyse supply and demand fundamentals and move power between countries  for the benefit of all.

https://youtu.be/gacGuWjqKco.

Once Europe is conquered  we do genuinely intend on going global. The American power markets look next on the plate  followed by the Australian and Japanese.

Professional experience with Python programming language (Java/C++ will be considered)

Job Description:

Design  build and operationalise large scale enterprise data solutions and applications using one or more of AWS data and analytics services in combination with 3rd parties - Spark  EMR  DynamoDB  RedShift  Kinesis  Lambda  Glue

Analyse  re-architect and re-platform on-premise data warehouses to data platforms on AWS cloud using AWS or 3rd party services.

Design and build production data pipelines from ingestion to consumption within a big data architecture  using Java  Python  Scala.

Design and implement data engineering  ingestion and curation functions on AWS cloud using AWS native or custom programming.

Perform detail assessments of current state data platforms and create an appropriate transition path to AWS cloud.

Optimise data systems and build these from scratch.

Support software developers  database architects  data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives.

Ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects.

Throughout the blueprint process engage in the development of defence strategies  combining technology and user behaviour  to ensure the security of your client

Work closely alongside the client and internal teams of professionals to develop innovative solutions based on their roadmaps  through mediums such as robotics and artificial intelligence.

Job Qualifications:

A Bachelor or?Masters?degree in Computer Science

Between 2-6 years working experience

Has experience in any of the following AWS Athena and Glue Pyspark  EMR  DynamoDB  Redshift  Kinesis  Lambda  Snowflake

Proficient in AWS Redshift  S3  Glue  Athena  DynamoDB

An aspiration to fulfill a role as an Expert/Architect on leading technical projects.

Perferably has an AWS Big Data Engineer ceritification or has obtained similar in cloud solution

Preferred experience: Java?or Python

An excellent communicator and good personal skills

Internal/external advisory/consulting experience

Demonstrated client management and relationship skills

Fluent in English

The passion for what we do has no boundaries  our resilience is authentic and our courage is limitless when facing new challenges.

We are proud of the culture we have built together.

We are proud of our people at the service of technology.

#TechforPeople.


OUR POSITIONING ABOUT COVID-19:

Due to the particular times we are facing and in order to protect our candidates and interviewers health and well being  all interviews will be held through video conference.

We've created a remote onboarding process to ensure that new starters have all the knowledge they need to be able to start this new career phase.


ABOUT THE OFFER

We are currently looking for a Data Engineer Tech Leader.

The desired qualifications and skills are:

BSc or higher degree in Computer Science or equivalent Software Engineering experience.
Between 3 to 9 years of experience in designing and implementing scalable software and data-driven services using Big Data technologies  data storages (e.g. relational databases  key-value stores)  data warehouses  and related data processing technologies  as well as programming languages such as Scala / Java / Python (for real-time and batch processing).
Experience in building and optimizing data pipelines that process large datasets using Spark and Hadoop environment
Familiar with working on cloud environments especially with data related services  for example BigQuery  Dataproc  GCS on Google Cloud Platform
Hands-on experience in analyzing large datasets (e.g. with SQL  Spark  Python  Hive etc.).
Experience with workflow management platforms (like Airflow) and collaborative platforms (like Jupyter or Zeppelin).
Knowledge of YAML (data serialization).
Microsoft Azure and PowerBI is a plus.
Some experience in the domain of information retrieval  information extraction or machine learning is a plus.
Good knowledge of Agile methodologies (Scrum  Kanban).


These are our mindsets and what you can expect from us:

Fair & Courageous
We promote Ask Me Anything sessions  a moment where any employee can question  suggest or share any topic live with the CEO.
We have a referral program that financially recognizes our employees for helping the company grow.
Ambition & Results
We believe in supporting the personal and professional growth of our employees. Thats why we have a differentiated career path management supported by a transparent model  capable of identifying  developing and adding value to your skills.
Weve created a Strategic Gatherings concept  a moment where information about the company's performance is shared and where we discuss short-term prospects for the future.
We are focused on a Thought Leadership program that aims to promote and develop our employees' talent  experience and passion for technology.
Learning & Innovating
We hold informal meetings to promote knowledge sharing moments between our employees and the technological community.
We invest in the continuous training of our employees through technical and behavioral workshops  language classes  external funded training and certifications and by establishing partnerships with training providers.
Caring & Sharing
We created the Blue Angels  a social and environmental responsibility program that puts the solidarity of our employees at the service of the community.
We love some good socializing moments and we hold as many as we can  from monthly themed meetings to family events  we never say no to a good party.


ABOUT BOLD

We are focused on developing and delivering innovative technological solutions through a unique combination of technology expertise and agility  maximizing business value for our clients.
Our focus when it comes to supporting our clients digital journey is about clear choices that build & develop skills in a very targeted way.
Since 2018  BOLD by Devoteam has been part of the Devoteam Group  a global leading player in Digital Transformation for leading organisations across EMEA  with a revenue of 761M. Together  we share a common vision of transforming technology to create value for our clients  partners and employees in a world where technology is developed for people.

Does the idea of working with large data sets  using innovative analytical techniques to answer clients marketing and business challenges attract you?
Worldpanel are recruiting a Global Advanced Analytics Analyst to join our Analytical Solutions team.

Kantar Worldpanel
Worldpanel is a world leader in consumer knowledge and insights based on consumer panels. Our High-Definition Inspiration approach combines market monitoring  advanced analytics and market research solutions that inspire successful actions on our customers.
We deliver both the big picture and the fine detail that inspire successful actions by our clients. Our expertise about what people buy or use  and why  has become the market currency for brand owners  retailers  market analysts  and governments internationally.
Our Global Analytical Solutions Team provides the opportunity to quickly grow your expertise in the field of Data Science by working and learning with a group of expert analysts and with some of the most powerful analysis tools and techniques available to understand the real-life consumer behaviour.

Role Description:
At Worldpanel  we are looking for an Analytical Development Analyst with a passion for data science who will make a significant impact on blue-chip companies  through leading on the exciting challenge to significantly improve our global capabilities.
In this role  you will be pivotal in developing a new suite of software solutions that require advanced analytical procedures embedded within them to meet the increasingly complex needs of our clients. To do so  you will work with an international community of experts to combine best-in-class data collection and preparation through top-end  efficient coding ending with dynamic final client deliverables.
Utilizing industry-leading consumer information and statistical techniques  you will help our customers address their toughest marketing-related issues and identify opportunities to grow.

Our Mission:
Advanced Analytics is the driving engine of global growth within Worldpanel providing huge scope of personal development. We are currently embarking on an exciting new challenge to significantly improve our analytical capability and this position will play a pivotal role in making this happen.
Our aim over the next 18 months is to develop a new suite of software solutions to meet the increasingly complex needs of our clients.
Worldpanel require someone who can lead the development of these solutions working with a wider community both internally across Worldpanel but also across our base of clients.
A challenging position within a fast-growing  dynamic  and innovative company working in an international role. The opportunity allows for growth and choice in a new and exciting career path.


Key Responsibilities:
Work with Worldpanel local and global advanced analytics team  as well as key clients  to create best in class outputs.
Apply a range of statistical techniques and modelling processes to transactional and attitudinal data to build innovative solutions to answer our clients business questions.
Work on the development of new skills  new analytical approaches and new ways of representing insight.
Acting as an analytical expert on key global projects  providing advice internally to ensure that our approaches and outputs remain best-in-class.
Support the development of junior members of the team  building the analytical and technical skills and offering problem-solving advice on specific projects.

Requirements:
University degree in a mathematical/scientific discipline  preferably with a statistics element.
A Masters-level degree in a closely related disciple (statistics  data science  etc.) and/or professional experience in analytics and modelling.
Ability to code in R essential. Knowledge of Shiny R  SAS  Python etc. advantageous.
Experience working with relevant modelling techniques  clustering techniques  regression  probability modelling etc.
Great organisational skills with the right level of creativity.
Critical thinking and collaborative leadership.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Fluent in English (other languages are advantageous).
Experience working across our tech stack which includes - Java  Spring  Angular  Databricks  Spark  SQL  Docker and Kubernetes all running in an Azure environment  beneficial.

Applying analytics applications in production settings.
A self-starter working across various levels of stakeholders to form complex briefs while pushing back where appropriate to achieve best outcomes.
Working well as part of wider project teams.

Were looking for a Business Analyst with excellent analytical skills who is able to synthesize and communicate information from multiple technical  legal and business sources in a coherent fashion to support our technical product management and leadership team in aligning our various stakeholder needs.


Experience with and knowledge about GDPR  Ad-Tech and Web analytics is a plus.


About Us


SN Digital (SND) is a technology division of Springer Nature. We are responsible for maintaining and delivering millions of articles used by researchers  scientists  professionals and students around the globe.

We are 230 people based in London  Berlin  Lisbon  Pune  New York  Madrid  Dordrecht  and Heidelberg. We work in collaborative  multi-disciplinary delivery teams  developing digital products and services that answer user problems and support business goals.

The work is exciting and meaningful.
Our culture is collaborative and friendly.
We encourage and support growth  both personal and professional.

Having a good command of English is essential; collaboration is vital in our day to day work  so being able to communicate your ideas and understand others is critical.

This role is a terrific opportunity for friendly  curious people who want to get involved in our work  who love to learn  who will embrace and develop our culture  and help make SND a place where people and ideas can thrive.

We are intentionally looking to create teams that are diverse and inclusive. Diversity is the mix of culture  background  experience and personality that we all bring; inclusion is getting the mix to work better together. We want every team member to contribute to our shared goals while respecting each other's skills  knowledge and needs.

Visit sndigital.springernature.com to learn more about who we are and what we do.


About The Job


We are looking for a skilled and passionate Business Analyst to help us build a toolkit that supports the daily practice and lifelong learning for professionals and researchers who want to stay up to date  stay qualified  and/or solve a specific problem. We do this by providing reliable  personalized information  high-quality interactive content and tools  and continued education  anytime anywhere.


We need a Business Analyst to join the team responsible for providing the platform  services  and know-how that support our various stakeholders to create flexible individually branded products  including the option to market these products via campaigns and newsletters and to fulfill their eLearning and eCommerce needs.


You will be joining a cross-functional delivery team with different nationalities  backgrounds and experience levels. All team members collaborate to deliver solutions that best satisfy the needs of our business  and we are working to create a culture that encourages new ideas and innovation that best suits Springer Natures vision. Our customer-centric approach is fundamental to the way we work.


About You

You can demonstrate the outstanding analytical ability to solve complex problems.
You can adapt easily and feel comfortable with uncertainty.
You proactively identify pain points and openly address any form of gaps.
You have proven experience in managing and resolving conflict with stakeholders.
You will have excellent communication skills and articulate concepts and ideas from technical and functional business perspectives.
You can demonstrate your experience in facilitating groups to achieve defined goals and outcomes using various facilitation tools and techniques.
You will have a strong focus on high-quality customer experience and sustainable solutions.
Have experience working in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
You use your drive  creativity  and initiative to move the team forward.
You have experience in driving continuous improvement and innovation across teams.
You are intellectually curious and motivated - constantly looking for more context.
You disdain routine and get involved with a wide variety of different activities.
You ideally have strong knowledge about GDPR  Ad-Tech  and Web Analytics


What you will be doing
Within 3 Months  you will:
Have an understanding of the teams context in the broader programme and business.
Have developed relationships with team members and core stakeholders.
Be familiar with the technology stack and data landscape
Can co-plan  organise and lead group sessions that generate ideas and resolve problems.
Can unearth the root cause(s) of pain points and validate business opportunities and problems.
Be an active participant of the Business Analyst communities.


By 3-6 months  you will:
Have a clear understanding of the teams priorities and be able to communicate this to stakeholders.
Build relationships with key providers and dependent teams.
Be able to monitor  track and communicate progress  risks  and issues to stakeholders.
Be able to prioritise competing demands and obtain buy-in from stakeholders.
Map  analyse  and validate information flows and user journeys to and from the product/service digital estate.
Gauge the complexity or scope of a piece of work  collaboratively breaking it into smaller pieces as appropriate.
Contribute to blameless post-mortems.
Set context with your team to ensure any solutions co-defined provide business value whilst solving customer problems


By 6-12 months  you will:
Onboard new members to the team
Co-define the complexity or scope of a piece of work  breaking it into smaller pieces when appropriate.
Ensure scoped work aligns with programme and company vision
Contribute to the design of the system architecture.
Understand our customers needs  both internal and external  and how your work affects their experience.
Give and receive constructive feedback within your team.
Organise and run sessions with your discipline peers within the Business Analyst community.
Actively work alongside your team to define the vision and strategy of your product or service in terms of business and customer outcomes.
Define KPIs to measure product/service performance in terms of business and customer outcomes.
Have a thorough understanding of the potential opportunities and limitations of your product/service offering
Instil a data-driven approach to current and future product/service development.


Day to day responsibilities
Youll work across multiple work streams and will:

Work with our many and varied stakeholders to understand and analyse their problems and needs.
Aggregate and visualize data and proactively ensure the flow of communication.
Support your team members in problem-solving activities to remove blockers and complete agreed-upon work.

Cipher  a reference company in Cybersecurity market and as a part of Prosegur Group  is looking for a Cybersecurity Analyst.

Job Description:
The security incident and event analyst  a.k.a Incident Handler  shall be responsible for real-time monitoring and response of security threats and vulnerabilities in cybersecurity. In the Security Incident and Event Management process  this role requires the ability to analyze events  vulnerability findings  logs and other data sources  in order to determine root causes of security events  providing recommendation to resolve the events  accordingly with established policies and best practices.

Main Responsibilities:
Analyze security incidents  alerts and events  to provide recommendation on action to address such issues.
Provide support to ensure rapid resolution of incidents  through an incident response platform  which enables the security analyst to track their resolution process.
Maintain a pro-active attitude and a communicative relationship with clients and management  to provide information throughout the incident life-cycle.
Pro-actively monitor clients' infrastructure  using specialized security application and private privileged information feeds.
Hands on troubleshooting  analysis  and technical expertise to resolve security incidents and client requests.
Execute and manage vulnerability assessments.
Provide comprehensive and accurate reports about incident response for Manager and Client.
Possible participation in after hours on-call rotation.

Requirements:
1+ year of work experience in the Information Security field  especially in the fields of incident response  incident handling and digital forensics.
Experience with platform operation in Cloud environments is a plus.
Familiarity with protocols and services  such as TCP/IP  SIP   DNS   DHCP   LDAP   SMTP  IMAP  HTTP  SMB  FTP  etc.
Understanding of UNIX based operating systems  including system installation / configuration  file system concepts  resource monitoring  user administration  package management  and process control/management.

Good scripting and task automation skills.
Ability to learn and operate in a dynamic environment.
Ability to work as a member of a team.

Working across cross-functional Academy and client service teams  you will tailor and execute capability building program delivery plans including communications  facilitator/teaching assistant preparation  participant enrollment  logistics oversight  minor revisions to solutions  program feedback and evaluation.

Feedzai is the worlds first RiskOps platform  and market leader in safeguarding global commerce with todays most advanced cloud-based risk management platform  powered by machine learning and artificial intelligence. Feedzai is securing the transition to a cashless world while enabling digital trust in every transaction and payment type. The worlds largest banks  processors  and retailers trust Feedzai to protect trillions of dollars and manage risk while improving the customer experience for everyday users  without compromising privacy. Feedzai is a Series D company and has raised $282M to date with a current valuation of $1.5B. Its technology protects 800 million people in 190 countries.

In today's world  it's easy to get overwhelmed with data. It can be spread in many sources and systems  and customers demand no less than top-notch dashboards and could care less about how complex and how much time it takes to get the data from its various sources and make it available for consumption. To make it worse  we've seen a huge increase in our customers' data science teams and their demand for real-time data to extract fresh features to train models that fight financial crime.

Feedzai Insights is an analytics platform that sets the foundation for a dedicated analytics stream for Feedzai systems. It allows from a simple query and searches to interactive dashboards and reports that help our customers understand how their business and risk teams are performing.

Responsibilities
Understand Feedzais context and architecture to design and build data integration pipelines involving technologies such as Java  RabbitMQ and Logstash
Build Logstash pipelines that collect and consolidate data from multiple sources under challenging data volume and throughput requirements
Model and implement Elasticsearch data storage enabling required visualizations with a focus on read/write efficiency and storage costs optimization
Build Kibana dashboards using both out of the box visualizations and Vega
Recognize and adopt best practices in data engineering and reporting: data integrity  test design  analysis  validation  and documentation
Work with Functional Analysts and UX Designers to assess the technical feasibility of proposed dashboard mockups iteratively
Take ownership of your work and always strive to raise the bar.
Required

Qualifications & Experience
MSc in a quantitative discipline (e.g.  engineering  computer science  mathematics);
At least 2 years of work relevant experience as a software engineer  data engineer  business intelligence engineer  or equivalent;
Experience in integrating  modeling and interrogating of data for efficient visualization;
Experience with Elasticsearch  Logstash and Kibana stack (valued);
Critical thinking and the ability to independently design and evaluate experiments and benchmarks to drive system decisions;
Passion for solving problems with data;
Good understanding of typical system quality requirements - Your heart beats with the 3 vectors of data-intensive applications: Scalability  Reliability and Maintainability;
Working in a team  as a team thus being as natural to you as breathing air;
Able to ask why - Don't settle for the status quo;
Foster Agility  being able to move fast  fail fast and learn fast.
Nice-to-have
Have a keen eye for visual aesthetics
Your First 30-Days At Feedzai

You will be immersed in our brand with training  connections  and one-on-one time with your manager. You may shadow your colleagues virtually or onsite at an office depending on where you work as you are supported through your Feedzai journey. In addition  you will have access to a ton of information to give you history  context  and all the knowledge you can handle about Feedzai and the team. Finally  you will start working on projects and collaborating on work currently being done. We can't wait to have you join the team!

Marketing Tech Team is responsible for building the product  technology  and data foundations that enable local and central marketers to do their job efficiently. This is a fresh team put together to tackle the topic with 100% focus. The mission starts with building the foundations of OLX Europes central marketing reporting and tracking mechanisms. This progresses towards extending the data foundation to help automate paid marketing efforts  and helping marketing make smarter spending choices to optimize for specific conversion types or ROI. Over time  this team is also expected to own and innovate on our owned media and in-product marketing tools -- extending and building on our marketing communication automations capabilities  consolidating our content properties (such as blogs)  and creating highly integrated capabilities for our marketers to use  to help us get full amplification of marketing initiatives

As a Lead Data Engineer  you will have full ownership of complex data pipelines and/or data products across the marketing domain  such as:
traffic source tracking
data feeds for giving feedback to paid marketing bidding platforms
audience segment generation
attribution models for marketing campaigns
innovative data products that allow us to integrate marketing campaigns seamlessly in our owned media (communications  landing pages  product pages)

Defining the strategy  design  execution  system configuration and operations of the marketing databases  marketing automation solutions  and tracking performance in order to plan  report and conduct analyses.
Building and monitoring data pipelines for accuracy  missing data  enhancements and changes to ensure all data is captured and processed accurately and when needed.
Working with cross-functional stakeholders in defining and documenting company-wide single sources of truth to ensure consistent and high-quality data
Reconciling data issues and alerts between various systems  finding opportunities to innovate and drive improvements
Your Profile:
7+ years of experience on large data sets and at least 5 years of experience working on AWS
Curiosity  willingness and ability to learn quickly and constantly  learn from others and share knowledge.
Self-drive  problem solving  openness to change  dealing with ambiguity  teamwork.
Ability to communicate in a way understandable for non-expert users.

Scripting: bash

About OLX

OLX Group is one of the worlds fastest-growing networks of trading platforms  serving 300 million people every month and operating in 30+ countries across 5 continents. We are powered by a diverse workforce of 10 000+ talented individuals  together building an inclusive culture around the world. We have the strong financial and operational backing of Prosus  one of the largest consumer internet groups in the world.

We know the value of a diverse workforce and an inclusive environment. We have seen for ourselves how this enriches our teams and allows people to flourish. We encourage people of all races  ethnicities  disabilities  ages  gender identity or expression  backgrounds and experiences to consider applying for this role.

SW Engineer: Database specialist

If you are passionate about innovation  curious about learning new technologies and want to work in a great environment  your site is here! If you don't know us yet  we are an engineering company working on different projects in telecommunications  space  defence and security.

You will be part of our team  full of talent and desire to innovate  where you will be able to to create a system to operate a next generation radio-observatory. We are looking for a SW developer  with great interest on databases to integrate the team developing the database layer.

DO YOU WANT TO BE PART OF OUR TEAM?

If you want this position to be yours  we would like you to have the following knowledge/experience:
Experience of software engineering to support and develop Relational Databases and associated services.
Experience with SQL databases such as MariaDB  MySQL and Postgres.
Experience with No-SQL or document oriented databases such as Elasticsearch (Solr  Lucene  ElasticStack)  and Redis
Experience with time-series databases such as OpenTSDB  InfluxDB  and Prometheus
Ability to write SQL queries  stored procedures  and perform basic database development leveraging SQL database standard.
Experience with developing database web-APIs in Python or PHP.
Experience in configuring and operating distributed data storage systems.
Experience of Agile development processes 
Experience of the Git distributed version control system 
Experience in test automation and continuous integration 
Experience of Test Driven Development 
Excellent communication skills  ability to work effectively as part of a team.
WHAT DO WE OFFER?
Join our GMV team and culture by entering into technological and innovative projects within multicultural and multidisciplinary teams.
Professional career development and training plan. You will be able to acquire or perfect knowledge in the technologies we use as well as in skills. We also offer a language learning program.
We are flexible! We have flexible hours and you can work from home to improve your work-life balance.
We care about your well-being. You will have private health insurance.
Social benefits plan where you will have several options such as restaurant tickets  childcare tickets  medical insurance for a family member.
Join our team activities  events and sports competitions.
No dress code! Be comfortable at work.
Are you coming from another country? We offer you a relocation package.
Do you want to switch off? You will find fruit and coffee at your disposal in our canteen.
We promote equal opportunities in recruitment and we are a company committed to inclusion and diversity.
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Alejandro Caballero Alejandre  in charge of this vacancy.

Alejandro Caballero Alejandre

IQVIA is looking for Analysts to join the Swiss Consulting & Analytics team based in Portugal!

With approximately 80 000 employees in more than 100 countries  IQVIA is in a truly unique position to be able to support companies seeking to improve real-world patient outcomes and enhanced clinical trial outsourcing through treatment innovations  care provision and access. With a broad range of healthcare information  technology and service offerings  IQVIA provide solutions that span clinical to commercial  bringing clients an exceptional opportunity to realize the full potential of innovations and advance healthcare outcomes.

Commercial Consulting (Commercial Effectiveness) is a key department in the Swiss Commercial Services team. This consulting team is responsible for designing and delivering commercial effectiveness solutions  supported by our world-class proprietary data assets  to fuel the advancement of our Swiss-based pharmaceutical and healthcare clients. The Consulting & Analytics team principally supports our clients in specific capability areas:


Commercial Effectiveness Consulting

Profiling  Segmentation & Targeting

Longitudinal Patient and Prescription dynamics tracking

Role Summary

Our analysts are central to delivering excellent analytical projects with our clients. They are responsible for owning and delivering work supporting senior members of the team  taking accountability to ensure deliverables are of the highest quality.

The data analyst:

Executes quantitative and qualitative analysis to answer the client needs
Review data delivered by data analysts and match these with client questions to develop relevant insights
Perform quantitative and qualitative market research  including interviews and online research
Assists consultants and senior consultant in design and structures of presentations
Prepare and present results to clients  including conclusions and recommendations
Proactively develops a basic knowledge of consulting methodologies and the pharmaceutical market through the delivery of consulting engagements and participation in formal and informal learning opportunities
Formal Qualifications And Experience
Master's Degree (or PhD) in Economics  Business Engineering  Business Administration  Biomedical/Industrial Engineering  Biotechnology  etc.
0 - 2 years of related experience in consulting  data analysis  or market research
Demonstrated interest in health and life sciences industry sector  and willingness to build deep industry skill
Strong analytical skills and a strong attention to detail
Good team player with strong interpersonal skills for influencing and advising
Perfect command of Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint
Fluent in English and Portuguese
What's On Offer

You will join a growing and innovative global company  leader in providing data  services and technology solutions to the healthcare sector. You will be part of a team at the edge of new data developments and modern technology solutions  offering a large spectrum of career opportunities.

The successfully candidate will have an attractive salary package in line with his/her experience.

Location: Oeiras

At IQVIA  we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible  to help our customers create a healthier world. The advanced analytics  technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70 000+ employees around the world who apply their insight  curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way. Learn more at jobs.iqvia.com.

Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset  a theme of inspiring excellence  and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so  we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.

With over 15 000 employees worldwide  the Microsoft Customer Experience and Success (CEnS) organization is responsible for the strategy  design  and implementation of the Microsoft end-to-end customer experience. This newly expanded organization reflects the Microsoft ambition to be known as a customer experience company  ensuring our Microsoft mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more is enabled by delighting customers and consistently exceeding their expectations in every interaction through a connected customer experience.

Microsoft has a tremendous opportunity to exceed customer expectations and drive greater customer loyalty and trust  which leads to greater satisfaction  retention  and growth. The CEnS organization is looking for people with a passion for delivering customer success to help us build a future where customers come to us  not only because we provide industry-leading products and services  and also because we provide a differentiated and connected customer experience that is rooted in our commitment to delivering on customer outcomes.

Support Engineers (SE) serve as frontline technical resources for Microsoft customers and partners via phone  email or web. They deliver unique value by collaboratively and reactively solving customer problems  providing proactive support advice  contributing to product quality and enhancements and creating self-help assets to broadly reach more customers. You will be part of a team responsible for providing an outstanding technical support experience to our business customers. From problem identification to full resolution  you will own and manage the customer experience over the phone and Web. When needed  you will collaborate with others to engage subject matter experts  Engineering (Product Groups) or Management. Your day to day job will be about providing both technical expertise (either on your own or by involving your colleagues) and about being an excellent communicator and a service oriented professional. You will be given the opportunity to become a subject matter expert in one or more areas and receive guidance and mentorship from your colleagues.

Responsibilities

Your Responsibilities
Responsible for the customer support experience with Microsoft
Own  troubleshoot and solve customer technical issues  using collaboration  troubleshooting best practices and transparency within and across teams (e.g. swarming)
Identify cases that require escalation (either technically or strategically)
Create and maintain incident management requests to product group or engineering group
Contribute to case deflection initiatives  automation and other digital self-help assets to improve customer and engineer experience
Provide ramp activities  knowledge sharing  technical coaching and mentoring
Drive technical collaboration and engagement outside of CSS (Product Engineering teams  Services  Support  Regions)
Lead or participate in building communities with peer delivery roles; may be workload or specialty specific
Qualifications

Qualifications

Language Qualification

English Language: confident in reading  writing and speaking.

Any other EMEA language knowledge is a plus

Required
BA  BS degree or 2-3 of relevant experience in similar positions
Experience with one or more customer support  product support  technical support  IT Admin support  Consulting  systems development  product development  network operations  software engineering  or IT consulting  customer or technical support or consulting or end-user support.
Excellent customer service and support skills required  with 2-3 years of related experience
Strong communication  customer empathy  problem solving  and technical writing skills
Great interpersonal and communication skills (both oral and written) and success in partnering with groups inside and outside of Microsoft
Self-motivated and independent thinker that routinely translates circumstances and understanding into actions that move the business forward in a measurable manner
Adaptability  flexibility and the ability to do the right thing under pressure and tight deadlines
Fundamental awareness of Private  Hybrid and Public Cloud. Any Azure certification is a plus
Solid understanding of standard computer science concepts  as well as knowledge of personal computer architecture and Operating systems  e.g.  Windows and Linux
Programming and debugging skills required  with additional knowledge of JSON  XML and CSV preferred
Knowledge and understanding of TCP/IP protocols and OSI model  with experience in troubleshooting network environments and familiarity with packet sniffers  e.g.  Wireshark or Network Monitor  is preferred
DNS  TLS and DHCP knowledge is a plus  along with Firewall and Proxy basic knowledge
Knowledge of Big Data concepts such as structured data vs unstructured data vs semi structured data
Experience in Extract Transform Load (ETL) / Extract Load Transform (ELT) pipelines
Expertise in Microsoft Azure Data Factory (ADF)  Networking and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) preferred. Knowledge of Azure Purview is a plus
This role might require to cover weekend shifts based on the business need to ensure 24/7 support coverage (tipically on a voluntary basis)

These requirements include  but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings: Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire / transfer and every two years thereafter.

About Kraken

Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of cryptocurrency so that you and the rest of the world can achieve financial freedom and inclusion. In our first decade  Kraken has risen to become one of the largest  most successful and respected crypto exchanges on the planet.

We are changing the way the world thinks about finance and our range of successful products are playing a critical role in the mainstream adoption of crypto assets. We continue to trail-blaze into new territory with the introduction of Kraken Bank  providing a more seamless integration between crypto and the traditional financial system. This makes us the first crypto company (ever) to be awarded a U.S. state banking charter.

Our diverse group of 2 400+ Krakenites are distributed all over the world as part of our 'remote first' culture  united by a shared passion for delighting customers  upholding crypto values and achieving our meaningful mission. We attract people who push themselves to improve  are radically transparent and think differently in order to unlock their potential.

Crypto is a rapidly evolving industry and were just getting started. Were growing fast and you're invited to join the revolution!

About The Role

The data engineering team is responsible for designing and implementing scalable solutions that allow the company to make data-driven decisions fast and accurately on several terabytes of data. The team maintains the companys data warehouse and data-lake  and you will be responsible for creating various pipelines to move and process vast amounts of data into the different data products. The team deals with both batch and streamed data  and split into different responsibilities and areas matching both the engineers and Krakens interest. The Data Quality Engineer will play a crucial part in building and maintaining robust and highly accurate data systems. This is a perfect opportunity for contributors who enjoy both the analysis and engineering of data projects.

Responsibilities

Actively help the team master data quality issues and proactively propose solutions to keep the data fresh and accurate
Build scalable and reliable ETL data pipelines and/or support peers on data quality aspects with their work
Contribute to the validation and quality assurance of highly critical data projects
Ensure high data quality for pipelines you build and make them auditable
Support design and deployment of distributed data store that will be central source of truth across the organization
Develop  customize  configure self service tools that help our data consumers to extract and analyze data from our massive internal data store
Evaluate new technologies and build prototypes for continuous improvements in data engineering

Requirements

3+ years of work experience in relevant fields (Data Engineer  Data Analyst  DWH Engineer  BI Developer  etc).
Familiar with the critical dimensions and aspects of data quality (i.e. accuracy  completeness  freshness  etc..)
Mastering SQL for both analysis and query optimization
Experience with data warehouse technologies and relevant data modeling best practices (Presto  Druid  etc)
Experience building data pipelines/ETL and familiarity with design principles (Apache Airflow is a big plus!)
Familiar with Python (or Scala) and common frameworks like Spark/PySpark  Pandas  Dask  or similar
Experience with business requirements gathering for data sourcing

Nice to have

Experience working with cloud services (e.g. AWS  GCP  ..) and/or Kubernetes
Experience with Docker
Experience in building and contributing to data lakes on the cloud
Working with petabytes of data

About Cobblestone

Cobblestone Energy is an independent trading firm. Founded in 2017  we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading. Although we have experienced very strong growth so far  we are still near the start of our journey. We have ambitions to go a lot further.

Energy in one form or another is fundamental to almost all the world's economic activities. By understanding the demand  supply  and logistics of these commodities  we can better understand the world.

We specialise in the proprietary trading of the short-term wholesale electricity markets across Europe. We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making  trading enough electricity every day to power a small country and growing every day. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.

Over the years we have grown organically. As part of our journey to be the best in all markets we enter  we would like to welcome Data Engineer interns into our team.

Cobblestone Values:
Lifelong learning with continuous reflection
Independent thinking through a meritocracy of ideas
The team is more important than the individual
Being the best in any market we enter
Hiring and keeping only the most effective people
Others must benefit from our existence.

Job Location:

It can be in our Dubai office or remotely with periodic travel to Dubai

Office Location:

Jumeirah Business Centre 2  Cluster V  Jumeirah Lake Towers  Dubai  United Arab Emirates

Responsibilities:

Data Engineer Intern will be contributing to the development  testing and delivery of our data pipelines and data infrastructure to support real-time collection and real-time processing of our data. He/she will be also participating in some of our Data Analytics projects.

This role might be converted to a full-time Data Engineer position  based on the performance of the hire during the internship period.

Requirements:
Candidates should be available to seek an internship of a minimum of 6 months.
Candidates must have a Bachelors/Masters in Data Science  Data Engineering or Data Analytics.
Strong academic performance with a GPA of A or B+ is required.
Strong skills/knowledge in Data Engineering are required.
Strong knowledge/expertise in Algorithms  Data Structures  Databases and AWS resources is required.
Experience in AWS Kinesis services is a big plus.
Excellent coding skills & problem-solving skills.
Candidates must be Autonomous  fast learners and result driven with the ability to adapt to a fast-paced dev environment.

We are looking to fill this role with a candidate that will support our suppliers in day to day queries for our Ariba Network platform  eager to provide best customer care and a special focus on technical requirements of the tool.

We are looking to fill this role with a candidate that can provide the following:

Key Responsibilities
Guide our suppliers on the daily usage of Ariba Network and troubleshooting;
Creation of training materials to improve useability;
Collaboration with D2PO manager and SAP Ariba in the implementation of new markets/ follow ups;
Direct cooperation with Content management team and Tech support;
Executing communications to suppliers;
Key Relationships
GBS Porto Leadership Team (S2P)
Market BPs
Operational Teams
Knowledge  Skills And Abilities
Strong knowledge of SAP Ariba or similar purchasing systems
Solid experience with SAP
Pro-active mindset in terms of identifying opportunities to drive automation
Experience in a fast-paced environment  Shared Services or similar
Ability to read  write and communicate in English in a business setting (additional language is a plus)

Solid interpersonal skills combined with a high degree of customer orientation; can navigate easily within complex organizations  connect with a variety functions  audiences  management styles  or cultures.

Highly results driven and self-motivated team player
Curious and growth mindset; keen to learn and approach subjects outside of comfort zone  look beyond the obvious

About Labrador:
Labrador is a Portuguese clothing brand born in 1991 with a first store in the heart of Lisbon. It rapidly grew to find its place in the wardrobe of thousands of men that were looking for exceptional quality  elegance and good taste. It was acquired by the portuguese Private Equity firm The Edge Group in 2013  which has been transforming the brand and has turn it into a fast growing business.
We are currently looking to hire a Business Intelligence Analyst  who will be responsible to perform analysis on all areas of the company to develop key insights for Management. The candidate will also work on special projects to transform and improve specific areas of the business. He/she will report directly to the CEO.
No previous experience is necessary. We are looking for an ambitious Masters student with strong analytical skills  who is eager to learn.
There are 3 NOVA SBE alumni currently on our team  who you can contact for more insights: Joao Ribeiro  Mariana Reis and Joao Monteiro (see Linkedin).
Salary:
The total target salary is 1250
It consists of 950 of base salary  and a variable of 300
The variable portion will be paid according to a performance evaluation between 0 and 10  both for specific projects and other qualitative dimensions.
Both the base and variable salary have specific targeted increases every 6 months  based on performance.
Job Description:
This role covers 3 main areas - Business Intelligence  Marketing & Sales and Finance.
Business Intelligence
The company has created this area recently  and developed the initial automated dashboards that already provide insights for the business. The candidate will have an active role in further developing this area for the company  and is expected to work on the following:
Weekly  Monthly and Quarterly updates to the currently defined KPI Dashboards
Develop new KPIs to monitor and execute on their automation for analysis.
Move the Dashboards from Excel to Power BI
Develop the KPI Dashboard for the areas of Marketing & Sales and Quality & Customer Service
Create Reports and action plans derived from analyzing the metrics being monitored
Marketing & Sales
In Marketing  the candidate will work on one or more of the following projects:
Create a Customer Segmentation analysis based on sales patterns and behavior
Generate tailored offers for clients based on their purchase behavior
Create Retention & reactivation offers for churned customers
Perform Portfolio & Pricing Optimization Analysis
Define and Implement an In-Store Customer Relationship Management software
Finance
In the Finance area  the candidate will essentially update currently available financial reports to monitor performance vs. forecast of Sales & Costs.
1. Generate Financial Reports for Management & Investors
Sales and Costs vs. Business Plan/Budget
Cash Flow Report & Forecast
Forecasting Capital Injection needs
2. Financial Control
Liaise with all Cost Centre Owners to generate and forecast budgets:
Operations & IT
Marketing & Comms.
Product
Analyze and Categorize all incoming Invoices to map against budget
Manage payments with suppliers according to disposable cash flow
In addition  the candidate will also be asked to work on specific special projects to improve the performance of the business (example: improve the Stock repurchase process)
Required profile:
The Ideal Candidate
We are looking for a candidate that can work independently and leverages managements time  by demonstrating initiative and requiring little guidance to perform its duties.
A candidate that constantly shows a willingness to learn and grow  and that is there for much more than a 9 to 5 job
A candidate that works well with variable compensation  where incentives are clearly aligned with both the quality of its assignments and companys results.
Shows Critical thinking and Is able to perform analysis and interpret the data to provide actionable tasks. This also requires strong skills in Excel (eg: PivotTables  use of Index/Match formula  etc.)
Can develop a coherent storyline to present any study or findings and is able to create a solid presentation for top management and investors
Why work at Labrador
This program represents a great opportunity to gain relevant experience in:
The world of fashion retail  in a brand highly recognized in the Portuguese market
Getting to thoroughly know the day to day activity of a company and all its areas of operation
Working directly for the top management of a company and its shareholders/investors
It is also a great opportunity to work for within a renowned private equity firm in Portugal (The Edge Group)  an investment firm with more then 300 Million Euros in assets. Moreover  to do so in a small team  with a startup environment and  therefore  with very high responsibilities and the ability to create real impact.

This newly expanded organization reflects the Microsoft ambition to be known as a customer experience company  ensuring our Microsoft mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more is enabled by delighting customers and consistently exceeding their expectations in every interaction through a connected customer experience.

Microsoft has a tremendous opportunity to exceed customer expectations and drive greater customer loyalty and trust  which leads to greater satisfaction  retention  and growth. The CEnS organization is looking for people with a passion for delivering customer success to help us build a future where customers come to us  not only because we provide industry-leading products and services  and also because we provide a differentiated and connected customer experience that is rooted in our commitment to delivering on customer outcomes.

Support Engineers (SE) serve as frontline technical resources for Microsoft customers and partners via phone  email or web. They deliver unique value by collaboratively and reactively solving customer problems  providing proactive support advice  contributing to product quality and enhancements and creating self-help assets to broadly reach more customers. You will be part of a team responsible for providing an outstanding technical support experience to our business customers. From problem identification to full resolution  you will own and manage the customer experience over the phone and Web. When needed  you will collaborate with others to engage subject matter experts  Engineering (Product Groups) or Management. Your day to day job will be about providing both technical expertise (either on your own or by involving your colleagues) and about being an excellent communicator and a service oriented professional. You will be given the opportunity to become a subject matter expert in one or more areas and receive guidance and mentorship from your colleagues.

Provide ramp activities  knowledge sharing  technical coaching and mentoring
Drive technical collaboration and engagement outside of CSS (Product Engineering teams  Services  Support  Regions)
Lead or participate in building communities with peer delivery roles; may be workload or specialty specific

Trouva is one of the fastest growing tech businesses in Europe (TNW Tech5)  one of Wired Magazine's hottest European Startups and is 1st in the prestigious Startups 100 Index  ranking the UKs best high growth startups.

A software-enabled marketplace  Trouva brings customers beautiful homewares from the best independent boutiques around the world. We know that unless people happen to be in the right place  at the right time  that perfect piece can be impossible to find. All too often  its sitting in a shop somewhere they dont even know about yet. Thats where we come in. Trouva was founded to make it easy for customers to discover just the right thing for them... wherever in the world it may be hiding.

Were using cutting edge technology to harness the expertise of the best bricks-and-mortar shops from Shoreditch to Stockholm  scaling their offering online to connect with a global customer base seeking unique  hard-to-find homewares. At Trouva  we envision a world where beautiful offline inventory is easily available to all.

Were lucky enough to be backed by world leading investors whose successes include ASOS  Farfetch  and Dropbox (Index Ventures  Octopus Venture and BGF)  with Angel Investors including current and former C level execs from Just Eat  Google  eBay & Deliveroo. Weve been covered by the likes of Forbes  Vogue  The BBC  TechCrunch and Sky News and have won Emerging Retailer of the Year at the Retail Week Awards  as well as being recognised by the likes of Retail 100  Maserati 100 and Technations Future Fifty.

Were growing incredibly quickly and are looking for exceptional people to join the Trouva family. Get a feel for what we're about through our Instagram or vision page.

The Opportunity

You will be part of the newly formed Data & Analytics team which combines the three core Data disciplines  Engineering  Analytics and Data Science. As a Data Engineer you'll actively take part in expanding our current stack and building new ETL processes. You will get to experience the opportunities and challenges of working with data streams that originate from different sources  the standardisation process and the automation triggers that are required to keep the data clean.

Collaborating with the wider Product team  you will help us define new processes and expose our data through APIs allowing the rest of the business to consume it and discover actionable insights.

At Trouva we have to constantly evolve and iterate over our data architecture and processes to match the fast growing needs of the business  and as part of that you will have the chance to work with different technologies and tools and to actively help shape the vision for Data Engineering.

Requirements
Good experience with SQL (we use Redshift  but dialect experience is flexible) for Data Interrogation and Manipulation
Experience using Python to deploy Data Functions (End to End ETL Processes  Integration with API/Non-API data sources  Data cleansing using libraries such as Pandas/Numpy  Writing effective tests)
Ideally  experience working in the AWS Stack (e.g. RDS  EC2  Lambda  S3) - and an inquisitive mindset for adopting other technologies such as AWS Redshift and Data Streaming
Keen to communicate and work closely on fast-moving projects with other departments ranging from other Developers to Product Specialists
Good knowledge of infrastructure as code
Bonus: Experience with general Database Monitoring and Performance Tuning practices
Bonus: We use Prefect (or similar) for our ETL workflows.

Benefits
Competitive salary and share options in one of Europe's most exciting start-ups. Equity is very important to us - we want you to be a shareholder in the company so you are part of the upside if we're successful together
25 days + public holidays
Flexible  remote working policy
Macbook Pro and Bose Noise cancelling headphones as standard issue  and any other tech you need to get the job done
Regular team events where we celebrate our success and people
Unlimited staff discount on all Trouva products and a Trouva gift card to get something awesome for your desk

What You'll Do

You will work in teams to solve pressing and complex issues at clients  as well as support the development of new proprietary tools  benchmarking databases and market perspectives.

In this role  you will work in teams of typically 3-5 consultants  playing an active role in all aspects of the client engagement. This includes gathering and analyzing information  formulating and testing hypotheses and developing communication and recommendations. Youll also present results to client management and implement recommendations in collaboration with client team members.

Feedzai is the worlds first RiskOps platform  and market leader in safeguarding global commerce with todays most advanced cloud-based risk management platform  powered by machine learning and artificial intelligence. Feedzai is securing the transition to a cashless world while enabling digital trust in every transaction and payment type. The worlds largest banks  processors  and retailers trust Feedzai to protect trillions of dollars and manage risk while improving the customer experience for everyday users  without compromising privacy. Feedzai is a Series D company and has raised $282M to date with a current valuation of $1.5B. Its technology protects 800 million people in 190 countries.

In today's world  it's easy to get overwhelmed with data. It can be spread in many sources and systems  and customers demand no less than top-notch dashboards and could care less about how complex and how much time it takes to get the data from its various sources and make it available for consumption. To make it worse  we've seen a huge increase in our customers' data science teams and their demand for real-time data to extract fresh features to train models that fight financial crime.

Feedzai Insights is an analytics platform that sets the foundation for a dedicated analytics stream for Feedzai systems. It allows from a simple query and searches to interactive dashboards and reports that help our customers understand how their business and risk teams are performing.

Responsibilities
Understand Feedzais context and architecture to design and build data integration pipelines involving technologies such as Java  RabbitMQ and Logstash
Build Logstash pipelines that collect and consolidate data from multiple sources under challenging data volume and throughput requirements
Model and implement Elasticsearch data storage enabling required visualizations with a focus on read/write efficiency and storage costs optimization
Build Kibana dashboards using both out of the box visualizations and Vega
Recognize and adopt best practices in data engineering and reporting: data integrity  test design  analysis  validation  and documentation
Work with Functional Analysts and UX Designers to assess the technical feasibility of proposed dashboard mockups iteratively
Take ownership of your work and always strive to raise the bar.
Required

MSc in a quantitative discipline (e.g.  engineering  computer science  mathematics);
At least 2 years of work relevant experience as a software engineer  data engineer  business intelligence engineer  or equivalent;
Experience in integrating  modeling and interrogating of data for efficient visualization;
Experience with Elasticsearch  Logstash and Kibana stack (valued);
Critical thinking and the ability to independently design and evaluate experiments and benchmarks to drive system decisions;
Passion for solving problems with data;
Good understanding of typical system quality requirements - Your heart beats with the 3 vectors of data-intensive applications: Scalability  Reliability and Maintainability;
Working in a team  as a team thus being as natural to you as breathing air;
Able to ask why - Don't settle for the status quo;
Foster Agility  being able to move fast  fail fast and learn fast.
Nice-to-have
Have a keen eye for visual aesthetics

You will be immersed in our brand with training  connections  and one-on-one time with your manager. You may shadow your colleagues virtually or onsite at an office depending on where you work as you are supported through your Feedzai journey. In addition  you will have access to a ton of information to give you history  context  and all the knowledge you can handle about Feedzai and the team. H.B. Fuller is a leading global adhesives provider focusing on perfecting adhesives  sealants and other specialty chemicals across all industries throughout the world. While our products are virtually invisible  they play a vital role in ensuring the quality of modern life and we are committed to connecting what matters to solve some of the world's biggest adhesion challenges.

We  at H.B. Fuller embrace a shared set of beliefs and competencies that direct the way we operate and express our fundamental principles about how we will achieve success. We strive to hire talent that demonstrates our beliefs and our competencies.

Position Overview

H.B. Fuller is looking for a dynamic  data oriented HR analytics professional to join our team. In this role you will work directly with HR Leadership and stakeholder to streamline and assist with reporting  data analytics  business processes and audits. The candidate for this role will have a combination of business acumen and technical knowledge  while at the same time being hands-on with reporting  data analysis  presentations  and problem-solving. The Global HRIS Analyst will play a vital role in working with a global organization in the reporting space for Workday

Primary Duties
Serve as the subject matter expert in Workday with in-depth knowledge in HCM/core module to include reporting/dashboards and HR analytics. Expertise in other Modules like Compensation  Advanced Compensation and Recruitment.
Adds new configuration elements to the various HR systems in operation  including approved changes to business processes  organization changes  workflows  and security models
Maintain the ongoing design  configuration  and deployment modules and processes in Workday
Analyze  design and build new complex custom reports relating multiple objects and including data transformations with standard Workday reporting functionality (ex: Report Writer  Calculated Fields)
Proven expertise managing multiple projects concurrently  with various teams and functional groups of the organization.
Troubleshoots HRIS issues and errors  quickly resolving them along with root causes.
Understand integration  set-up  testing and impact
Back-up for other HRIS Analysts
Support new Workday Release activities and any other related activities.
Monitor service-desk ticketing dashboard and complete HR systems tickets/requests within dedicated service level agreement.
Minimum Requirements
Bachelors degree (or equivalent) in Human Resources  IT  business or related field
Workday expertise
Minimum 5 years professional level HRIS  information technology or human resources experience
Excellent communication skills. Comfortable working with various business functions across the company.
Advanced knowledge and skills in Microsoft Office (Word  Excel  PowerPoint and Access.
Preferred Qualifications
MBA or Masters in an appropriate quantitative or related field or Human Resources
5+ years of progressive work with data  metrics  statistics software
Experience from within a large  complex  national or international organization recognized for world class human resources processes.
Strong presence  high professional and personal standards and the ability to challenge the status quo.
Excellent communication skills.
Be a part of a learning journey at H.B. Fuller where you will help shape and mold how H.B. Fuller leverages the power of Workday. This is a unique opportunity to learn Workday and grow your skills through global system projects that deliver real-world solutions to the business and our employees.

TECHNOLOGY
We're on a mission to build the technology that powers the global platform for luxury fashion. We operate a modular end-to-end technology platform purpose-built to connect the luxury fashion ecosystem worldwide  addressing complex challenges and enjoying it. We're empowered to break traditions and revolutionise  with the freedom and autonomy to make a difference for our customers all over the world.

PORTO
Our Porto office is located in Portugal's vibrant second city  known for its history and its creative yet cosy environment. From Account Management to Technology and Product  whatever your skills are  you'll find your fit here. You can have an informal meeting in the treehouse or play the piano in your lunch break!

THE ROLE
We are looking for an Infrastructure Engineer to join our Data Platform Infrastructure (DPI) team within the larger Global Infrastructure organization. As a fast-growing tech public company  Data is a strategic pillar to our company. The Data Infrastructure team works very closely with the application engineers  data engineers  data scientists  security  infrastructure as well as other product and technology teams.

As part of this team  you will be joining high-skilled engineers who are responsible for the automation  delivery  performance  resiliency  patching  upgrade and other research and development activities for critical data platform infrastructure like Databricks  Airflow  Azure Data Lake Storage  Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and offer them as platform services to other technology teams.

Follow good practices about scale  performance  geo-distribution  multi-cloud  code maintenance  documentation etc. Keep Evolving  Keep Improving.
Fully own what you build by supporting the colleagues on using and extending the automation and tools so that they can deliver faster  better  harder  stronger! You did it  you own it!
Maintenance of all products within the Data Platform infrastructure responsibility.
Work with stakeholders from data engineering and science teams and assist them with data-related technical issues
On-call support for teams that are using the data platform

WHO YOU ARE
Passionate about data and cloud infrastructure and challenges at scale.
A professional with solid technical background on data and cloud infrastructure working with multi-disciplinary engineering teams towards goal achievement.

Proficient in written and spoken English.
Not afraid of challenges. There are no "problems"  only a better challenge.
You are proactive  you like to help others  "Team Player" is your Middle Name.
You don't want to learn  you need to learn.

At Lisbon Tech Hub we create value in the digital transition of companies from Portugal to the world. There are more than 1200 professionals working in Cybersecurity  Analytics Business Intelligence  Application Lifecycle Management  IT Project & Service Management and IT Infrastructure Management.
