Company Name: Domino's Pizza Portugal  Central Europe & South-Eastern Europe
Job Details:
We are looking for a Senior Business Analyst to join our Insights Department  with a high level of creativity in analyzing data to:
deliver reports with conclusions 
new insights and recommendations to the company's senior management
analyze the potential impact of those recommendations.

The main analytical tool is Microsoft Power BI.

Qualifications/Skills
5+ years of experience in a similar position with proven analytical background.
Knowledge in data storytelling to deliver conclusions and insights to the senior management.
Experience working with senior decision makers.
Professional English is required as you will belong to a multinational team
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.
Advanced Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint skills.
Microsoft Power BI user.

We count on you to:
Perform analytics regarding menus  product profitability  offers performance  pricing  drivers of growth  differences among sales channels and service methods and competitors performance 
Always looking for new opportunities to maximize the business results and boost market growth.
Determine targets to be achieved by the main Business KPIs
Monitor performance and execution.

Problemas complexos exigem a experincia certa! Um dos maiores desafios da atualidade  o correto armazenamento e processamento de dados tendo em considerao estes trs domnios (3Vs): Volume  Velocidade e Variedade.
Na Xpand IT  a rea tecnolgica de Big Data desenvolve e implementa arquiteturas e solues de software que tratam da captura  ingesto  armazenamento e gesto de dados crticos de grandes clusters de informao onde os 3Vs esto sempre presentes. Tiramos partido de um conjunto de frameworks avanadas como Apache Hadoop  Confluent  Cassandra  MongoDB usando Java e Scala como linguagens de programao para interagir com estas frameworks.

QUAIS AS PRINCIPAIS RESPONSABILIDADES?

Enquanto Big Data Software Engineer vais ter um papel essencial juntamente com os Big Data System Engineers para em conjunto desenvolverem solues de software  aplicando as melhores prticas em termos de desenho e arquitetura de sistemas distribudos de grande escala. Ser tua responsabildade tambm garantir o desempenho e a escalabilidade do software que interage com os sistemas backend Big Data  contribuindo para a manuteno da performance geral do sistema.

Diariamente sers responsvel por:
Implementar solues de software em que  fulcral a performance do carregamento  pr-processamento e ingesto de grandes volumes de dados em clusters Big Data
Desenhar e desenvolver solues de software robustas e escalveis  independentemente da quantidade de dados a processar
Implementar boas prticas e padres de desenho das solues Big Data no software produzido
Anlisar problemas complexos que necessitam de solues eficientes para manipular grandes quantidades de informao.
Desenvolver modelos e organizao de estruturas de dados que otimizem as operaes de pesquisa e armazenamento em sistemas distribudos de grande escala
Desenhar e desenvolver de APIs de comunicao entre os sistemas de backend Big Data e sistemas externos atravs de protocolos de comunicao standard

// Stacks tecnolgicas: Java; Scala; HDFS  Hive  Impala  Spark  Kafka/Confluent; MongoDB  Cassandra  HBase

QUE SKILLS PRECISAS DE TER?

Licenciatura e/ou Mestrado em Informtica e Computadores  Sistemas de Informao ou Cincia da Computao.
Fortes conhecimentos de sistemas operativos Linux.
Experincia com tecnologias baseada em Java (JBoss  Spring  Spring MVC  Hibernate)
Experincia na definio de interfaces de comunicao utilizando standards (XML  JSON  SOAP)
Experincia na implementao de padres de desenho em solues de software avanadas (mutli-threaded  multi-process  multi-cloud).
Experincia em bases de dados relacionais e no relacionais (SQL  MySQL  NoSQL  Hadoop  MongoDB)
Elevada experincia no uso de ferramentas Eclipse  Maven  Jenkins  GIT  JIRA ou equivalentes
Boa capacidade de comunicao e facilidade em trabalhar em equipa  com foco na resoluo de problemas complexos
Fluente em Ingls (escrito e falado)

// Pontos extra para:
Conhecimento ou experincia na utilizao de frameworks como Apache Spark  Kafka ou o ecossistema Hadoop.

At ConvaTec  our vision is to develop pioneering trusted medical solutions to improve the lives we touch. We are a global medical technology business focused on serving people and care givers in the areas of advanced wound care  ostomy care  continence and critical care and infusion care. We devise  develop and manufacture innovative products and services that support people with deeply personal and challenging medical conditions  helping to improve care for them and giving them greater confidence  freedom and mobility.

We are guided by our five core values  that shape the way we work  every day: Improve Care  Deliver Results  Grow Together  Own It and Do Whats Right. We are a global Group  with over 9 900 employees and in 2020  our Group generated revenues of over $1.894 billion. To learn more about ConvaTec  please visit www.convatecgroup.com.

At ConvaTec were transforming our business for the better. Better products. Better ways of working. And better ways of delivering for our customers and each other. Were aiming for nothing short of excellence. Join us as IT Business Analyst and youll do the same.

Role Summary

Working within a customer-first  agile framework  the Senior Business Analyst works to answer the What and Why questions that inform and define new solution concepts.

They are responsible for eliciting  challenging and refining business requirements and collaborate with the Business Partner to build robust business cases for review and approval. They also support the Product Portfolio Directors /Owners in capturing requirements for existing products to enable sprint scheduling and prioritization.

Duties And Responsibilities
Elicit  challenge and prioritise business requirements for stakeholder approval
Capture business requirements in the appropriate format for the relevant Customer Digital Solutions (CDS) team
In collaboration with the Business Partner and/or Product Portfolio Directors deliver a robust cost/benefit analysis to enable data-driven bullseye decisions
Develop the proposed solutions user acceptance criteria
Facilitate user adoption of the solution and ensure the smooth handover to the support team
Ensure there are agreed metrics to evaluate the impact of the solution in line with the agreed requirements
Support the creation of solution benefit reports and facilitate stakeholder discussion to agree next steps
Surface opportunities to Business Partners and Product Portfolio Directors to re-use successful solutions/ways of working in other areas of ConvaTec
Balance and align the requirements of the Centres of Excellence/Business Units with ConvaTecs overall business objectives
Act as an advocate for the CDS team across the business including supporting the Business Partner and Product Portfolio Directors with education/workshops on digital capabilities
Person Profile
Customer-first mindset
Ability to bridge communications between business and technical teams
Excellent written English  including the ability to summarise complex data clearly and succinctly
Excellent listening  questionning  presentation and facilitation skills
High-level of accuracy and attention to detail
Ability to self-organise
Capacity to deliver on multiple levels and tasks  switching priorities as the need demands
Ability to lead workshops with senior stakeholders in order to challenge and refine requirements
Ability to capture requirements in the appropriate format  Business Cases  Functional Specifications  creating and elaborating user stories
Deep experience of producing system and process diagrams  both As-Is and To-Be
Fluency in standard user story format and acceptance criteria
Fluency of Confluence  JIRA  prototype/wireframes and user journey flows
Flexibile and agile mindset with the ability to work across different team functions and projects
Experience of working in a global environment
Experience of key digital asset management tools such as:
App Store
Android store
GitHub
Jira
Confluence
Expo.io
Google Analytics
Google Firebase
Perfecto Test Mng.
DXP(EpiServer)
Our products make a big difference every day. So will your contribution. The work you do will mean more  because itll make things better for your team  our business or our customers lives. Itll inspire you to deliver to your very best. And well be right behind you when you do.

This is a challenge more worthwhile.

This is work thatll move you.

Detalhe Da Oferta

At HeiQ (we are on a mission to improve the lives of billions of people by heiqing materials.

Since our inception as spin-off from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zurich (ETH) in 2005  we

have created some of the most effective  durable and high-performing textile technologies on the market

today. Over 300 brands like Burberry  Zara  Burton  Patagonia  Speedo  Uvex  Itochu  or Serta Simmons sell

products with our technologies inside. This makes every-day products more functional  more comfortable

and more sustainable  and has won us 18 awards that we are proud of.

In order to continue our growth story  boosted further by our recent going-public  we are looking for a battleproven 

result-driven  data savvy  curious  strategically minded and entrepreneurial

Data Scientist (100%)

to join the groups IT team reporting to the Director Systems & Services.

Your Responsiblities

In this newly created role  you are on a mission to build world-class data capabilities for HeiQ.
In line with HeiQs Strategy  you spearhead the execution of the Groups data strategy.
You model  build  and improve the company data warehouse (Azure SQL Data Warehouse).
You create ETLs (Data Factory  PySpark) to pump data from primary and secondary sources in the data
warehouse.
You help to identify data sources in the business  to define KPIs and set targets  and to analyze
performance across the business.
You establish automated reports that serve the executive team and other business functions using
suitable Business Intelligence tools.
You collaborate with other departments and perform ad hoc analysis based on their needs.
What We Offer You
The opportunity to be part of and help shape HeiQs global growth story.
The chance to take responsibility and make a difference.
Hard work  a breath-takingly high pace  and a direct communication style.
The dynamics and flexibility of a young and agile company combined with the experience and
professionalism of large international players.
The possibility to split your work between our office in Porto (Portugal) and Home-office.
You Bring
Master or PhD in a quantitative field (Mathematics  Statistic  Computer Science) or equivalent relevant
experience.
3-5 years of practical experience in the domain of data science and analytics
Experience building Data Warehouses. An understanding of Dimensional Modeling and OLAP paradigms
are a big plus.
Experience with Business Intelligence tools like PowerBI  Tableau or similar
Solid SQL and Python skills.
Solid understanding of databases.
Experience with Azure Data Factory  PySpark.
Experience with Databricks is a plus.
Experience in a fast-paced company and working under pressure.
Project management skills  ideally from working as a consultant  is a plus.
A sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on companys success.
You Are
Result-driven  curious  strategically minded
A critical thinker with a can-do attitude. Where others see problems  you see opportunity and solutions.
An authentic team player that is demanding of her/himself. With great interpersonal and communication
skills.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in data science.
Ideally experienced with Jira  Confluence.
Full professional proficient in English (mandatory for all employees working at HeiQ - additional
languages are advantageous).

Does that sound like a great challenge to you? Please visit and submit your

application to us. Only English applications will be considered; only suitable candidates will be contacted.

Competncias

Ofertas de Emprego Semelhantes:

Job Description

As a global consulting partnership in more than 40 countries  our people make us who we are. We're individuals who take as much joy from those we work with as the work itself. Driven to be the difference between a big idea and making it happen  we help our clients break through.

The Summer Internship Program provides interns with a real Kearney experience.

Our interns experience an actual consulting engagement. As fully participating members  Summer Business Analysts are provided with the opportunity to contribute ideas  opinions and new information.

What You Can Expect
We work in a collegial way. As a Summer Business Analyst  you will receive full and ready access to our firms best talent to help you quickly achieve your full potential.
We value collaboration. You will work alongside team members who will help you grow as you help our clients solve their most important issues.
We promise immediate impact and growing advantage. That promise holds true for both you and our clients. You will be able to make an impact and develop your potential from day one within a professional environment and culture that actively fosters the following:
Personal development

At Kearney  we encourage you to be yourself  and we give you the freedom to contribute creatively while you also pursue your passions. The rich  diverse backgrounds of our consultants have a direct impact on what our teams accomplish every day a dynamic that has defined our culture for nearly 90 years. Together  we work on stimulating projects that produce powerful  transformative results for clients  both now and in the long term.



Entrepreneurial approach

The Kearney internship program is an outstanding introduction to the discipline of management consulting. No two client engagements are alike  and we are committed to providing you with a hands-on experience that will have a positive impact on the rest of your career. Typical responsibilities include developing models  performing complex analyses  and working on research assignments both in the office and at client sites for a wide range of industries. You will benefit from our global scale and capability without compromising the speed and nimbleness afforded by our close-knit teams.



Supportive environment

Training is a crucial component of your introduction to the firm. As an intern  you will learn essential concepts and methodologies that are crucial to management consulting. You will work with a mentor who will engage with your project manager and offer support and guidance throughout the program. Top-performing consultants who have been with the firm fulltime for at least two years and who are committed to returning to the firm are eligible for tuition support from the Kearney Scholars Program.

Qualifications

What We are Looking for:

The Following Qualifications Are Preferred

There is no standard model for Kearney business analyst interns. We are looking for talented problem-solvers who are ready to integrate as full members of the client team. Interns are expected to contribute ideas  opinions  and new information.
BSc/ MSc degree in Business  Engineering or Mathematics
Strong critical thinking and analytical capabilities
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Forward-thinking and collaborative approach to problem-solving
Proficiency in Microsoft Office
Language Requirements

Native/ Fluent in Portuguese Advanced English

Marley Spoon is the new way to cook. We bring delightful  market fresh and easy cooking back to the people while building a sustainable supply chain for a waste-free world. Were a well-funded and publicly listed company (ASX: MMM).

We operate across 3 continents and in 8 countries with over +900 employees worldwide. Being passionate foodies  we are using technology to reinvent the global food supply chain to reduce food waste. In the end  it's simple: We started Marley Spoon because we love cooking! We now have an exciting opportunity to bring a Data Scientist on board our team  working across all brands and territories. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be part of the food revolution and join our food-tech start-up as we take our growth to the next level.

As a part of the team  you'll be responsible for:
Building a range of analytical models (Prescriptive  Predictive  Diagnostic  Descriptive)
Building predictive and segmentation models (e.g. RFM segmentation  churn prediction  sentimental analysis  recommendation engines  next best offer  propensity scoring models  etc.) making use of relevant data from multiple data sources
Deploying  maintaining and improving the models using various types of algorithms and techniques
Mine data from multiple sources and to build/enhance stored procedures/functions
Providing deep-dive analytical support for the business

Requirements
MSc or Ph.D. in a quantitative discipline: Machine Learning  Computer Science  Statistics  Applied Mathematics  Physics or related fields
Experience in a Data Science related role
Hands-on experience in building segmentation and prediction models with large datasets using various algorithms and techniques (decision trees  logistic regression  neural networks  clustering  etc.)
Hands-on experience in Python and common numerical and ML packages (NumPy  SciPy  Scikit-Learn  Pandas  Keras  TensorFlow  PyTorch  and PySpark)
Good software engineering practices e.g. unit tests  logging  CI/CD pipelines  software patterns and experience developing production software
Sound knowledge of classic prediction processes (classification  regression  ranking  time series)  and inferential statistics (tests  interpretation of models)
Experienced dealing with large amounts of data and knowledge of big data technologies (e.g. SageMaker  AirFlow  Snowflake  Looker)

Benefits
Autonomy  Impact  Collaboration  Learning & Growth
Being part of a profitable company in full-blown scale-up phase - offering immense opportunities for personal & career growth
Flexible working hours  a hybrid work environment and/ or full remote
Spend 5% of your working time on personal learning and development
Conference / Training budget
Food allowance of 7.62 euros per worked day
Health insurance to all employees
Company training in different areas
Company equipment
Company Events
Extra Annual leave days (total 24)

About Webhelp
Webhelp is a French multinational BPO company that is making business more human for the worlds most exciting brands. By choosing Webhelp you will be part of a family of over 95 000 game-changers from more than 190 locations in 51 countries.
Join us at Webhelp Portugal and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team  a fast-paced environment  and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.
About the job role

As an Installed Base Analyst  you will be joining our Team by building an extraordinary relationship and working closely with all our Customers  Partners and Stakeholders. Your objective will be to manage and optimize all assets from purchase to renewal  always safeguarding and ensuring data accuracy of our customers.

As an Installed Base Analyst  you will:
Managing renewal contracts for software and services
Ensuring the negotiation of overall renewals
Monitoring quote creation  prepare customers meetings and make sure all contracts are close on time
Engaging with account managers to define renewal and up-sell proposals
Identifying growth opportunities
Defining and perform risk assessments for all contracts  products  and services
Ensuring closing for all renewal activities by leading Customer & Partner team
Build strong relationships with Customer Decision Makers to guarantee their objectives.
We are looking for:
English fluency (C1/C2) is mandatory

Experience in working with multiple stakeholders and managing data across many sources
Experience in Software
Excellent IT skills: Excel  Salesforce and Tableau
An amazing verbal and written communication capacity
Awesome negotiation skills
Great project management skills
Amazing analytical thinking  detail-orientation and a strong organizational capacity.

New and modern offices in Lagoas-Park  Oeiras  Lisbon.

We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist & AI Engineer to join our growing team. The primary responsibility of the role will be to understand the clinical business objectives and develop models that help to achieve them  along with metrics to track their progress. This will include creating machine learning models and retraining systems. To do this job successfully  you need exceptional skills in statistics and programming. The successful candidate will lead all the processes from data curation  cleaning  and preprocessing  to training models and deploying them to production.

Role and Responsibilities
Perform research and development of machine learning algorithms to expand product capabilities.
Design  develop and maintain the machine learning infrastructure
Integrate machine learning into software solutions focussed functionality  performance  reliability  and scalability.
Run machine learning tests and experiments  select appropriate datasets and data representation methods
Verifying data quality  and/or ensuring it via data cleaning
Defining validation strategies/Defining the preprocessing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset/Defining data augmentation pipelines
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results  train and retrain systems when necessary
Presentation of results and progress at weekly meetings
Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks and keep up to date with developments in the field
Collaborate with the Deciphex team to Improve existing products
Support our R&D & test teams to ensure the quality of our solutions
Assist product managers and business stakeholders understand the potential and limitations of AI when planning new products.
Complete all mandatory company training and job specific training required for the role  including ISMS  GLP  DocuSign  SDLC as applicable

Education / Qualifications/ Experience
A degree in Computer Science or related field with a focus on machine learning; PhD preferred.
At least one year of relevant industry experience is required.
At least two years of image processing experience is required.
Artificial intelligence software development experience using Python  additional knowledge of C++ desirable.
Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries.
Ability to design and develop robust scalable solutions  experience with cloud-based solutions desirable.
Deep knowledge of maths  probability  statistics  and algorithms.
Ability to research and develop solutions independently.
Experience with GLP regulations or software will be a distinct advantage.

Desired Characteristics
Must be focused with a sense of urgency and immediate impact  capable of working in an agile environment
Possess sound communication skills to address issues quickly & comprehensively with internal & external parties
Must be self-motivated with a willingness to learn and take ownership
Must be effective at time management and personal organization / planning
Ability to present complex information in a clear and precise manner; with a non-technical audience internally and externally.

FARFETCH exists for the love of fashion. Our mission is to be the global platform for luxury fashion  connecting creators  curators and consumers.

We're a positive platform for good  bringing together an incredible creative community made up by our people  our partners and our customers. This community is at the heart of our business success. We welcome differences  empower individuality and celebrate diverse skills and perspectives  creating an inclusive environment for everyone. We are FARFETCH for All.

OPERATIONS

We're passionate about operational excellence  acting with our customers and partners always in our heart. Covering the entire order journey  we create our online content  secure payments and fraud process compliance  ensure order fulfilment and delivery  while providing customer and partner care. In a nutshell  we love to create seamless and memorable luxury experiences for our customers all around the world.

PORTO

Our Porto office is located in Portugal's vibrant second city  known for its history and its creative yet cosy environment. From Account Management to Technology and Product  whatever your skills are  you'll find your fit here. You can have an informal meeting in the treehouse or play the piano in your lunch break!

THE ROLE

Stock Analysis in Farfetch is highly reliant on selecting  capturing  processing and acting on the right data at the earliest stage possible in the season. The Stock Analyst will join the team of Stock Analytics supporting two main streams of work: Supply Analytics and Demand Analytics. Supply Analytics: Reporting to Senior Manager of Logistic Planning  you will enable full stock visibility within Farfetch  and their 1P partners. You will work together with Commercial Data Science Teams to support our partners on Assortment Planning  Stock Planning  Open To Buy and Manufacturing decisions. You will create robust analytics that help our teams to make better decisions. Plan for WH long term occupation and liaise with Fulfillment by Farfetch teams to optimize Cost of Storage.

What You'll Do
Develop and maintain the data streams needed to update the planning tool  ensuring our analytics fits the needs of our 1P partners;
Turn analytics into insight that is relevant for the Farfetch warehouses  planning for demand at the various stock points and understanding the impact of availability in the overall network on the demand for our warehouses.
Work with the Data Science team on predictive models to clarify the expected behavior of our stock throughout the season and to support 1P partners on allocation decisions that maximize availability and minimize obsolescence.
Support the modelling  planning and execution of the deployment and movement of stock within our network;
Work with the Catalogue Management team and commercial teams  optimizing routes throughout FF.
Who You Are
BA or BS in Engineering  Mathematics  Economics  Statistics  Computer Science or another technical field;
Minimum 2 years of experience in data analysis in a Supply Chain or Stock Management related area;
Experience in Fashion is very important for this role;
Experience with stock analytics and planning software is bonus;
Strong analytical and problem solving skills;
Process oriented with the ability to identify solutions to problems and opportunities by analyzing data;
Results driven  resilient and with a commercial mindset;
Fluent English
Rewards & Benefits
Health insurance for the whole family  flexible working environment and well-being support and tools
Extra days off  sabbatical program and days for you to give back for the community
Training opportunities and free access to Udemy
Flexible benefits program
FARFETCH Equity plan
EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES STATEMENT
FARFETCH is an equal opportunities employer ensuring that all applicants are treated equally and fairly throughout our recruitment process. We are determined that no applicant experiences discrimination on the basis of sex  race  ethnicity  religion or belief  disability  age  gender identity  ancestry  sexual orientation  veteran status  marriage and civil partnership  pregnancy and maternity  or any other basis prohibited by applicable law. We continue to build our consciously inclusive culture as part of our Positively FARFETCH strategy throughout our business  partnerships and communities.

In line with HeiQs Strategy  you spearhead the execution of the Groups data strategy.
You model  build  and improve the company data warehouse (Azure SQL Data Warehouse).
You create ETLs (Data Factory  PySpark) to pump data from primary and secondary sources in the data
warehouse.
You help to identify data sources in the business  to define KPIs and set targets  and to analyze
performance across the business.
You establish automated reports that serve the executive team and other business functions using
suitable Business Intelligence tools.
You collaborate with other departments and perform ad hoc analysis based on their needs.
What We Offer You
The opportunity to be part of and help shape HeiQs global growth story.
The chance to take responsibility and make a difference.
Hard work  a breath-takingly high pace  and a direct communication style.
The dynamics and flexibility of a young and agile company combined with the experience and
professionalism of large international players.
The possibility to split your work between our office in Porto (Portugal) and Home-office.
You Bring
Master or PhD in a quantitative field (Mathematics  Statistic  Computer Science) or equivalent relevant
experience.
3-5 years of practical experience in the domain of data science and analytics
Experience building Data Warehouses. An understanding of Dimensional Modeling and OLAP paradigms
are a big plus.
Experience with Business Intelligence tools like PowerBI  Tableau or similar
Solid SQL and Python skills.
Solid understanding of databases.
Experience with Azure Data Factory  PySpark.
Experience with Databricks is a plus.
Experience in a fast-paced company and working under pressure.
Project management skills  ideally from working as a consultant  is a plus.
A sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on companys success.
You Are
Result-driven  curious  strategically minded
A critical thinker with a can-do attitude. Where others see problems  you see opportunity and solutions.
An authentic team player that is demanding of her/himself. With great interpersonal and communication
skills.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in data science.
Ideally experienced with Jira  Confluence.
Full professional proficient in English (mandatory for all employees working at HeiQ - additional
languages are advantageous).

Does that sound like a great challenge to you? Please visit and submit your

application to us. Only English applications will be considered; only suitable candidates will be contacted.

We will be in touch as soon as possible.

Competncias

QUERES FAZER A TUA CANDIDATURA?

Wolters Kluwer Governance Risk and Compliance (GRC) is one of four global operating divisions of Wolters Kluwer  serving customers around the world with expert information  solutions  software  and services. GRC provides legal and banking professionals with solutions to ensure compliance with ever-changing regulatory and legal obligations  manage risk  increase efficiency  and produce better business outcomes.

We are currently looking for a Business Systems Analyst to join our team in Lisbon.

Mission

Acts as a liaison between the Local and European Regulation and the development of software reporting solutions in order develop and implement new systems and enhancement of existing solutions for Regulatory Reporting.

Evaluates new applications and identifies systems requirements.

Evaluates new IT developments and evolving business requirements and recommends appropriate systems alternatives and/or enhancements to current systems.

Prepares communications and makes presentations on system enhancements and/or alternatives.

The Successful Candidate Will
Play a key role in supporting the monitoring and the interpreting Regulatory changes in the financial sector (Banking  Insurance  etc.) in order to comply with a consistent and normalized data model
Work closely with the technical teams to ensure that they have a clear understanding of requirements and support them throughout the development process
Perform functional testing to align in the of developments with functional specifications
Participate actively to product documentation  in particular for the functionalities you have specified
Participate to product second line support by analysing reported customer issues and providing resolution recommendation
Maintain regular contact with fellow business professionals (subject matter experts) to discuss the effect and interpretation of regulatory changes and to maintain a high standard of business expertise
Maintain regular contact with customers to discuss solutions and questions
Focus on upholding the consistency and the integrity of the data model  align always with the other data models from the company so that the development is consistent throughout the models provided.
Requirements
Bachelor degree (or higher) in accounting  economics or finance
Experience in banking accounting and / or in a functional analyst role  within a bank  insurance company or within a software company delivering financial software or within financial services
Experience of working with financial software  particularly with regard to banking and regulatory data warehouses or reporting solutions
Computer literate - relational database and SQL knowledge is a plus
Ability to analyse financial regulation and to translate into functional requirements
Relevant experience and knowledge of banking regulatory requirements is a plus
Knowledge on Portuguese Banking Regulation  Credit Risk  Liquidity Risk or IFRS is an asset
Responsible  well organized and self-motivated
Excellent communication and inter-personal skills
Good written and spoken English
Presentation skills
Ability to integrate and work in a multicultural team and in a fast paced development and delivery organization
Problem solving skills and the ability to learn quickly
Commitment to a long-term employment

QUERES FAZER A TUA CANDIDATURA?

We are SwissBorg  a FinTech startup headquartered in Lausanne  Switzerland.

Our flagship product  the SwissBorg app  offers over 550 000+ users the best price and liquidity across 16 fiat and 17 cryptos  as well as giving them the opportunity to earn passive income with our Smart Yield account. Our community is growing fast  with over $1.5 billion in assets under management  a weekly volume of over 250 million  and over 18 000 Premium users.

This is just the start in our mission to democratise wealth management by building products that allow individuals to manage their crypto assets at the touch of a finger. Whether youre in Andorra or Zimbabwe  whether your portfolio is worth one dollar or a million  SwissBorg gives you the best tools to learn about digital currencies and manage your wealth.

Are you looking to join a team of revolutionaries on a mission to decentralise nations? We want to hear from you!

Please note this is a fully remote role for a candidate who can be based anywhere in European timezone

What You Might Be Doing
Identify requirements for the data pipelines layout  design  and implementation
Design  build  maintain  and troubleshoot SwissBorg's data delivery and data processing systems
Be the link between the backend services and the data analytics teams
Work on scaling the existing data systems to accommodate the future growth
Optimize databases and query performance
Solve challenging problems in the context of data and distributed systems

What You Might Bring
Expert knowledge of at least one JVM based language (Java/Kotlin/Scala). Scala is a plus
Good practical knowledge of Python
Good understanding and practical experience with Apache Kafka
Expertise in modern data storage and data processing tools and techniques
Experience with RDBMs  data warehouses  cloud-based data processing architectures
Flexible  proactive  organized  detail-oriented and entrepreneurial
Excellent English communication skills. French is a plus
Experience in the finance industry is a plus

Why You Should Apply
Freedom to build the company of your dreams
Learn with (super cool) experts in finance  engineering  AI  psychology and business
CHSB bonus based on our meritocratic system
We'll provide you with a MacBook and a cutting edge tech stack to help you do your best work
Flexible work hours
Annual team retreats with colleagues around the world
Continuous learning and development opportunities
Oh and are you planning on having a kid? Thats great! We have a bunch of those: youll get time off to enjoy that (other) adventure!

At SwissBorg  we embrace diversity. We strongly believe that getting to the best outcomes requires different perspectives and backgrounds. Were committed to openness  curiosity and creating an inclusive culture as we know that diverse teams build better products and generate better ideas. We strongly encourage applications from everyone regardless of race  religion  colour  national origin  gender  sexual orientation  age  marital status  or disability status.

Anncio de emprego: Data Scientist HeiQ Portugal:Heiq Iberia Unipessoal Lda.

Anncio De Emprego

Descrio do emprego:

Data Scientist HeiQ Portugal



Heiq Iberia Unipessoal Lda.



18-01-2022



Ref: 7356556



Porto



Informtica ( Gesto de Redes )

Detalhe Da Oferta

At HeiQ (we are on a mission to improve the lives of billions of people by heiqing materials.

Since our inception as spin-off from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zurich (ETH) in 2005  we

have created some of the most effective  durable and high-performing textile technologies on the market

today. Over 300 brands like Burberry  Zara  Burton  Patagonia  Speedo  Uvex  Itochu  or Serta Simmons sell

products with our technologies inside. This makes every-day products more functional  more comfortable

and more sustainable  and has won us 18 awards that we are proud of.

In order to continue our growth story  boosted further by our recent going-public  we are looking for a battleproven 

result-driven  data savvy  curious  strategically minded and entrepreneurial

Data Scientist (100%)

to join the groups IT team reporting to the Director Systems & Services.

Your Responsibilities

In this newly created role  you are on a mission to build world-class data capabilities for HeiQ.
In line with HeiQs Strategy  you spearhead the execution of the Groups data strategy.
You model  build  and improve the company data warehouse (Azure SQL Data Warehouse).
You create ETLs (Data Factory  PySpark) to pump data from primary and secondary sources in the data
warehouse.
You help to identify data sources in the business  to define KPIs and set targets  and to analyze
performance across the business.
You establish automated reports that serve the executive team and other business functions using
suitable Business Intelligence tools.
You collaborate with other departments and perform ad hoc analysis based on their needs.
What We Offer You
The opportunity to be part of and help shape HeiQs global growth story.
The chance to take responsibility and make a difference.
Hard work  a breath-takingly high pace  and a direct communication style.
The dynamics and flexibility of a young and agile company combined with the experience and
professionalism of large international players.
The possibility to split your work between our office in Porto (Portugal) and Home-office.
You Bring
Master or PhD in a quantitative field (Mathematics  Statistic  Computer Science) or equivalent relevant
experience.
3-5 years of practical experience in the domain of data science and analytics
Experience building Data Warehouses. An understanding of Dimensional Modeling and OLAP paradigms
are a big plus.
Experience with Business Intelligence tools like PowerBI  Tableau or similar
Solid SQL and Python skills.
Solid understanding of databases.
Experience with Azure Data Factory  PySpark.
Experience with Databricks is a plus.
Experience in a fast-paced company and working under pressure.
Project management skills  ideally from working as a consultant  is a plus.
A sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on companys success.
You Are
Result-driven  curious  strategically minded
A critical thinker with a can-do attitude. Where others see problems  you see opportunity and solutions.
An authentic team player that is demanding of her/himself. With great interpersonal and communication
skills.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in data science.
Ideally experienced with Jira  Confluence.
Full professional proficient in English (mandatory for all employees working at HeiQ - additional
languages are advantageous).

These applications provide financial institutions with a wide variety of tools for leading business development  running daily processes  enhancing product offers  and exporting diverse reports.

Your key Responsibilities: Parametrize and integrate IT Lending solutions!
Working on the business and functional requirements from the end-users
Preparing business processes documentation and identifying gaps
Participating in the development as Business/System Analyst and manual tester
Configuring the system and enhancement of the application database (Oracle)
Identifying and documenting relationships between systems and their integration methods (API / Flat files etc.)
Conducting application training with business users

You are ideal for this opportunity if you have:
3+ years of working as a Business / System Analyst
Experience with Revolving products and especially Card  payments concepts
Fluency in both spoken and written English and B2/B1 level of French
The practice of BRD and FRD preparation
Experience in UAT and regression testing
Relational database (Oracle) and SQL knowledge
Great communication skills
Possibility to travel and work abroad
Extensive understanding of the software delivery quality
MS Office proficiency

It is a strong plus if you have :
Experience in the financial industry
Direct cooperation with business units on client-side
Business process modeling using BPMN standard and UML knowledge
Foreign language capabilities: Spanish  German  Portuguese

We offer you:
ITDS Business Consultants is involved in many various  innovative  and professional IT projects for international companies in the financial industry in Europe. We offer an environment for professional  ambitious  and driven people. The offer includes:
Stable and long-term cooperation with very good conditions ;
Enhance your skills and develop your expertise in the financial industry
Work on the most strategic projects available in the market
Define your career roadmap and develop yourself in the best and fastest possible way by delivering strategic projects for different clients of ITDS over several years
Participate in Social Events  training and work in an international environment
Access to attractive Medical Package
Access to Multisport Program
Access to Pluralsight
Flexible hours & remote work
Opportunity to live abroad (Germany  Spain  Portugal)

#GetReady

About The Team

Our Customer Service team is the public face of the company and provides first-class front-line support to our millions of customers. We are also internal customer-champions  working with product teams to ensure users stay at the forefront of everything Revolut does. We're a truly diverse  international group and we work across three European offices.

We hire people who know how to act fast  look for root causes and solve problems  not follow scripts. We expect every person to drive change and bring value to Revolut by contributing more than just resolving tickets. We dedicate a lot of time for personal and professional growth and as a result  by the time our agents "graduate" support they are fully trained to rock in any other role in the company (and are in demand from lots of teams!).

About The Role

The rapidly-expanding Quality Control Department plays a crucial role in Revoluts development as we grow into a major international business. Our goal is to ensure that our Customer Support teams are operating at their best quality performance.

Quality Control will enable you to play a big part in the Revoluts drive by working closely with all Customer Support departments  supporting analysts and their Line Managers. You will be able to be an expert in multiple workflows  gain new skills and keep developing your professional career.

Were looking for Mid or Senior Quality Control Analysts to sit within our team at our Porto office or remotely from any other city in Portugal . Weve hired some of the most self-driven individuals that the world has to offer and were keen to showcase their talent to the world - and thats where you come in. Our team is detail-oriented  technical and we love to get down into the nitty-gritty of our processes to deliver the best possible results.

What You Will Be Doing

Be responsible for completing monthly Quality Control (QC) activities by focusing on identifying successes and failures in compliance teams work
Highlight and reporting any issues to Quality Control and Managers
Providing feedbacks to the analysts and identifying root cause analyses of the errors
Delivering quality refresher session to the individuals who are struggling with the quality performance
Coaching new joiners Learn all procedures across compliance department
Collaborate with other teams across different locations
Carry out any other ad-hoc duties as required by your Supervisor
Be flexible with responsibilities and have a positive attitude towards any changes to role  company/departmental objectives  priorities and targets.

What You'll Need

Previous experience as Quality Support
Strong attention to detail and analytical skills
Practical knowledge of Google Sheets  Forms  Slides will be a plus
You are ready to take ownership and responsibility
You have flawless English

A little about usWhen Revolut was founded in 2015  we had a vision to build a sustainable  digital alternative to traditional big banks. Our mission now is to help our customers improve their financial health  empower them to have more control  and promote financial cohesion across the communities in which we operate. Launching into 2021 with 15 million Personal customers and over half a million Business customers only reinforced our belief in the vast need across the world for better financial services.

What were looking forRevolut is being scaled up by people all around the world who share our vision. Were looking for people who align with our five core values: we believe that we Get it Done because we Think Deeper and are strongly rooted in the Dream Team. We Never Settle hence why we always Deliver Wow. You want to join a community forward thinking people - we are here for you. We believe in empowering our Revoluters in their work  giving them autonomy and ownership of what they do. We want everyone at Revolut to own their story and their successes - working with us means youre not just another cog in the machine.

The Benefits

Competitive salary
Performance bonuses
Medical insurance
All the latest tech you need
Roll with a free Revolut Metal subscription

O NOSSO POSICIONAMENTO RELATIVAMENTE AO COVID-19:
Neste momento particular que vivemos de forma a protegermos a sade e o bem-estar dos nossos candidatos e entrevistadores  todas as entrevistas sero realizadas via chamada telefnica ou video-conferncia.
Crimos um processo de integrao totalmente remoto para garantir que os novos colaboradores tm acesso a todo o conhecimento necessrio para esta nova fase da sua carreira.

SOBRE A OPORTUNIDADE:
Estamos  procura de um Business Analyst.
As qualificaes e skills necessrias so:
Formao Superior em reas de IT ou semelhantes;
Slidos conhecimentos da vertente do negcio e estratgia;
Experincia no desenvolvimento de requisitos tcnicos e funcionais com conhecimento das melhores prticas de QA;
Capacidade de anlise e construo de reports;
Conhecimentos de Jira e/ou Confluence;
Bons conhecimentos em Ingls.
Estes so os nossos mindsets e o que podes esperar de ns:
Fair & Courageous
Realizamos sesses de Ask Me Anything  um momento onde qualquer colaborador pode questionar  sugerir ou partilhar live algum tema com o CEO.
Temos um programa de referenciamento que reconhece financeiramente os nossos colaboradores por ajudarem a empresa a crescer.
Ambition & Results
Apoiamos o crescimento pessoal e profissional de nossos colaboradores. Por isso  temos um plano de carreira diferenciado  suportado por um modelo transparente  capaz de identificar  desenvolver e agregar valor s competncias de cada colaborador.
Crimos o conceito de Strategic Gatherings  um momento onde so partilhadas informaes sobre a performance da empresa e se abordam perspetivas de futuro a curto prazo.
Estamos focados num programa de Thought Leadership que pretende promover e desenvolver o talento  a experincia e a paixo pela tecnologia dos nossos colaboradores.
Learning & Innovating
Realizamos encontros informais de partilha de conhecimento entre os nossos colaboradores e a comunidade tecnologia  abrindo as portas da nossa casa para meetups.
Investimos na formao contnua dos nossos colaboradores atravs da disponibilizao de workshops e formaes tcnicas e comportamentais  aulas de lnguas  formaes e certificaes externas financiadas e estabelecendo parcerias com entidades formadoras.
Caring & Sharing
Crimos os Blue Angels  um programa de responsabilidade social e ambiental que coloca a solidariedade dos nossos colaboradores ao servio da comunidade.
Adoramos bons momentos de convvios e so muitos os que organizamos  desde encontros temticos mensais a eventos para a famlia  nunca dizemos que no a uma boa festa.

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations  flights  and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings  our 4 000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity  creativity  and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership ?enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

The Opportunity:

Business Strategy Analysts play an integral part by supporting decisions and projects with actionable data insights  reports and tools used to make key business decisions

In this role  youll get to:
Performance tracking and modeling: Analyze data generated by supply and supply teams  develop models we can use for performance tracking and optimization  draw recommendations on your analysis
Support and participation in projects: Provide input on initiatives to reach business targets of the strategic projects you will be working on  run and then assess your proposed actions in collaboration with the relevant teams
Building tools: Create and deliver dashboards  automated reports  calculators and data feeds to optimize and improve processes related to our products and operations
What youll need to succeed:
Minimum 2 yearsof experience working in business analysis / data analytics / business intelligence/ consulting or financial modelling roles in e-commerce  tech  consulting or financial services companies
Bachelors Degree or higher from a top university in a business analytics  engineering  statistics  quantitative  data or finance subject (e.g.  BI  science  math or financial analysis)
Ability to communicate fluently in English
Familiarity with SQL  Tableau  advanced Excel skills  which you were using on real work projects before
Proven track record in using data to measure performance  build reports and tools and make decisions
Intellectual curiosity  ability to learn fast
Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced/rapidly changing environment
Its Great if you have:
Experience with complex analytics and statistical/machine learning techniques using R/Python/Spark
Experience building automated analytical processes and functionality
Masters degree in statistics  operations research  or data science

LIVE

What You Will Do

The Global Value & Access IS (Information Systems) organization  part of the GCOIS (Global Commercial IS organization)  is responsible for partnering with the Global Value & Access Team  defining and executing the IS Strategy supporting their journey to drive execution excellence and continuous improvement in four key areas shape access environment  define a world class access strategy  drive new access capabilities and govern prices. As part of this team you will analyze  develop and maintain the pricing platform that supports global business processes such as the tender and contract capabilities  pricing governance and scenario planning. This role will work with business as well as with other IS teams and is key for the success to deliver on the business priorities. In this role you will
Design  build  test and maintain Anaplan models for key stakeholders to meet the needs of the business processes  fully utilizing the functionality of the Anaplan platform.
Liaise with business to ensure requirements are translated into system functionalities.
Manage business requests  working with diverse user groups.
Assist in gathering requirements to continuously improve the implementation of different platforms.
Collaborate with vendors and information technology to prioritize  launch and implement new tools and system enhancements.
Participate in the Agile development process.
WIN

What We Expect Of You

We are all different  yet we all use our unique contributions to serve patients. This information systems professional we seek is a self-starter with the following qualifications
Bachelors degree in Computer Science or similar
Experience in a similar role

Experience working both independently and in a team-oriented collaborative environment
Preferred Qualifications
Experience of the pharmaceutical  medical device  biotech or general healthcare industries is an advantage
Familiarity with Agile
Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills with complex technologies
Experience in complex enterprise environments
Preferred Certifications (any)
Anaplan Level 2
THRIVE

As we work to develop treatments that take care of others  so we work to care for our teammates professional and personal growth and well-being.
Vast opportunities to learn  develop  and move up and across our global organization.
Diverse and inclusive community of belonging  where colleagues are empowered to bring ideas to the table  take risks  and act.
Generous Amgen Total Rewards Plan comprising healthcare  finance  wealth and career benefits.

CI&T is a digital specialist  partner in end-to-end digital transformation. As digital natives  we bring a 26-year track record of accelerating business impact through complete and scalable digital solutions. With a global presence of more than 5.000 professionals in strategy  research  data science  design and engineering  we unlock top-line growth  improve customer experience and drive operational efficiency.

Business Analyst - Portugal

We are looking for a person to join our team of experts working on a global expansion program for a major company in Europe. We need someone determined to apply their knowledge to help the client to solve their main business problems  acting in the rollout of business strategies  transforming the daily lives of its employees and delivering quality solutions to its consumers in different regions of the world.

This person will be responsible for detailing the business scenarios in order to find  together with his/her team  opportunities to apply best practices to solve the identified problems.

Your Mission

Understand and detail business requirements  autonomously  representing CI&T in client meetings and working side by side with teammates from Brazil  Portugal and the UK.

You need to be fluent in English for this opportunity as you will be in constant daily contact with the customer.

Requirements For This Challenge

Solid experience with analysis  management and communication of business requirements.

Experience detailing requirements and interacting with key stakeholders using agile methodologies.

Experience understanding processes  business challenges and defining solutions for them.

Ability to share acquired knowledge with any team member and with different seniority levels.

Workplace/Travel

Youll work in our Lisbon office and/or from your home  with occasional local and regional travel opportunities.

You will stand out if you have

Experience with agile software development.

Experience with experimentation.

Experience with the use of Jira and Confluence for control  visibility and documentation of software requirements.

Main Activities

Communicate with customers (technical and business) with autonomy  understand the objectives and real needs as well as align the solutions formalizing and documenting the requirements.

Detail software requirements in a clear and understandable way  so that they are easily understood  followed and implemented by the development teams.

Interact with your team to ensure the quality and accuracy of the work delivered.

Ensure that the work delivered is in line with customer and stakeholder expectations.

About Us

At Cloudflare  we have our eyes set on an ambitious goal: to help build a better Internet. Today the company runs one of the worlds largest networks that powers approximately 25 million Internet properties  for customers ranging from individual bloggers to SMBs to Fortune 500 companies. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware  installing software  or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare all have web traffic routed through its intelligent global network  which gets smarter with every request. As a result  they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks. Cloudflare was named to Entrepreneur Magazines Top Company Cultures list and ranked among the Worlds Most Innovative Companies by Fast Company.

We realize people do not fit into neat boxes. We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills  and we are ready to help you do that. We cannot complete our mission without building a diverse and inclusive team. We hire the best people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time at Cloudflare. Come join us!

What you'll do
Develop and maintain backend billing system configurations  product configurations in the Order to Cash flow and accounting system workflows
Provide support and maintenance for the self-service subscription billing application within the Development  Test and Production environments
Support continuous system improvement of all aspects of customer billing for a variety of customer bases including service provisioning  product bundling  complex pricing  usage rating  invoice terms  support for several payment methods and currencies to name a few.
Participate in systems analysis and detailed systems design.
Support/ build integrations with backed billing system  tax systems  payment gateways/ processors and applications involved in billing eco systems
Respond promptly to application alerts  production issues and follow through to resolution per established SLAs
Partner with the Revenue Ops to document and re-engineer current processes within business applications  support month end close process
Identify gaps and opportunities for automation and work on Proof of concepts for new requirements as appropriate
Work with external vendors and product support teams to troubleshoot systems issues as they arise
Perform day-to-day maintenance of the application in operation  including tasks related to identifying issue root cause(s)  troubleshooting issues  and issue resolution  dispatch to partner teams  and/or escalation
Seek opportunities to streamline and/or automate procedures

Examples Of Desirable Skills  Knowledge And Experience
2+ years experience with a subscription billing system (eg. Stripe  Zuora  Oracle BRM  goTransverse Tract)
Ability to develop and maintain automation scripts for billing platform in any scripting languages like python  Go
Fluency with writing queries any one database language MySQL/ BigQuery/ Oracle
Possess excellent communication skills  written and oral  interpersonal and organizational.
Strong documentation skill writing functional/ technical specs
Ability to handle multiple projects and responsibilities with competing priorities
Demonstrated experience working with business functions to understand and map processes to functional and technical specifications

Bonus points if you have:
Understanding of business Financial processes including but not limited to Order to cash process including OM/ Billing/ AR/ RevRec and understanding of GL
Track record of delivering successful large-scale  business transformation  and multi-disciplinary change initiatives especially in Subscription/SaaS model
2+ years experience in systems analyst roles  implementing and supporting ERP applications such as Oracle  Netsuite  SAP or Workday Financials
Business engagement and business analysis experience in implementing ERP systems is preferred

What Makes Cloudflare Special?

Were not just a highly ambitious  large-scale technology company. Were a highly ambitious  large-scale technology company with a soul. Fundamental to our mission to help build a better Internet is protecting the free and open Internet.

Project Galileo : We equip politically and artistically important organizations and journalists with powerful tools to defend themselves against attacks that would otherwise censor their work  technology already used by Cloudflares enterprise customers--at no cost.

Athenian Project : We created Athenian Project to ensure that state and local governments have the highest level of protection and reliability for free  so that their constituents have access to election information and voter registration.

Path Forward Partnership : Since 2016  we have partnered with Path Forward  a nonprofit organization  to create 16-week positions for mid-career professionals who want to get back to the workplace after taking time off to care for a child  parent  or loved one.

1.1.1.1 : We released 1.1.1.1 to help fix the foundation of the Internet by building a faster  more secure and privacy-centric public DNS resolver. This is available publicly for everyone to use - it is the first consumer-focused service Cloudflare has ever released. Heres the deal - we dont store client IP addresses never  ever. We will continue to abide by our privacy commitment and ensure that no user data is sold to advertisers or used to target consumers.

Sound like something youd like to be a part of? Wed love to hear from you!

With a broad range of healthcare information  technology and service offerings  IQVIA provides solutions that span clinical to commercial  bringing clients an exceptional opportunity to realize the full potential of innovations and advance healthcare outcomes.

We are looking for a passionate Business Analyst to provide solutions that enable life sciences

companies to innovate with confidence and maximize their opportunities.

Working at IQVIA Portugal youll have the opportunity to work with the major pharmaceutical companies and other healthcare stakeholders in Portugal.

Join us on our exciting journey!

Your Role

Youll be part of a local consulting team  working in projects dedicated to:

Analyze secondary data and desk market research to identify key findings and trends

Perform quantitative or qualitative analysis to support client deliverables and business decisions as they relate to IQVIA data

Assist in data preparation  deliver components of the project with senior support and assist in ensuring quality of the final deliverable

Assist in creation of presentations for clients and attend  support and present at client meetings with senior support

Be able to quickly learn and work with sales and promotional data  market and epidemiology assessment  pipeline analysis and market research with senior support

Your Background

New graduates or candidates with 1-3 years experience  with a background related to health  economics or statistics

Knowledge in MS Excel  MS Access  and MS PowerPoint

Knowledge in any of the following (preferential): SAS  R Programming  or Excel VBA

Knowledge and interest in pharmaceutical and healthcare market & trends

Demonstrate analytical  interpretative and problem-solving skills  working with large and multiple data sets to process data in the required format for the analysis

Well-developed written and verbal communication skills

Adaptability and an ability to learn quickly and apply new knowledge

Fluent English.

We need please to receive all the candidatures in English

At IQVIA  we believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible to help our customers create a healthier world. The advanced analytics  technology solutions and contract research services we provide to the life sciences industry are made possible by our 70 000+ employees around the world who apply their insight  curiosity and intellectual courage every step of the way. About the job:

About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations  flights  and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings  our 4 000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity  creativity  and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership ?enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know our Team:

Agoda has been one of the fastest growing online travel agencies in the world in recent years  expanding our global reach as well as our portfolio of travel-related products. A critical driver to this success has been the Agoda Finance team. Within the FP&A team  we are responsible for providing insightful and actionable intel to the senior management team across the company  to facilitate effective decision-making . Having experimentation and data analysis deeply ingrained in our culture  we provide the strategic insights Agodas business leaders need to push into new territories in sustainable and scalable ways. We also prioritize career development in Agoda Finance. Every function within the team has a well-defined career track with clear goals and development targets each step of the way.

The Opportunity:

The Senior FP&A Analyst reports into the Senior FP&A Manager and involves close collaboration with many of the key leaders within the business  as well as the rest of the FP&A team and the wider Finance organization.

The rapid growth of the business and the increasing complexity driven by new launches and services make this role an exciting  interesting  and very challenging proposition. Expected to help drive performance  build plans for the future  as well as manage regular reporting  forecasting  and general planning. The role is very broad-based and will require an individual who is motivated to make a big impact.

In This Role  Youll Get To:
Add immediate value and support the organisation during an exciting and dynamic growth phase
Support the forecast process in conjunction with key stakeholders  and in collaboration with the rest of the FP&A team
Work with the Team Lead to manage a rolling monthly forecast model and provide timely insights into performance against budget/forecast
Prepare segments of reports to the Board  Shareholders and Advisers as required and directed from time to time
Co-develop incisive analysis and reporting to give insights to business performance and trends  including use of KPIs and OKRs
Undertake additional planning and budgeting activities as required
Enhance the understanding and key levers of the Agoda business
Support the delivery of annual budgets  quarterly guidance  and monthly and weekly forecasts as well as related financial planning & analysis
Provide financial analysis (FP&A) & commentary on month-end financials & KPIs
What Youll Need to Succeed:
Minimum 4 years in accounting or related fields  2 years in FP&A
Chartered Accountant qualified: ACA or CIMA  or equivalent
Hands on experience of using EPM/BPM systems (planning tools)
Exceptional Excel and financial modelling skills
Ability to take ownership  to work independently and to meet tight deadlines with a logical  methodical approach to prioritising tasks and responsibilities
Demonstrable success at developing quality insights for non-finance management teams  ideally gained in an e-commerce company
Commercially aware  able to think both analytically and strategically  to think logically about underlying business issues
Pro-active in resolving queries and problems and highlighting future potential areas of risk
A willingness to get involved in the business to understand the story behind the numbers
Digital  ecommerce  travel backgrounds preferable

About The Team

Quality control is the most centralised place in customer support with a real impact on how we deal with customers and how agents develop. We hire people who know how to act fast  look for root causes and solve problems  not follow scripts. We expect every person to drive change and bring value to Revolut by contributing more than just reviewing the tickets.

Our goal is to ensure that our Support teams know how to operate at their best quality. We are working on continuous evaluation and improvement of the experience in both sides of chat/phone/email minimising the volume of errors and developing agents to be the best customer support.

Were looking for Quality Analysts to work in Portugal  in our Porto office or remotely. Our team consists of some of the most self-driven individuals that the world has to offer and were keen to showcase their talent  and thats where you come in.

About The Role

As Quality Analysts our role is to look for the business needs of customer support to help them achieve better performance and improve customer experience.

We deeply dive into how our agents speak to our customers and how our internal processes work in order to  so to say  support the Support.

The Quality Control team will allow you to play a big part in Revolut's drive towards better service. You'll be able to become an expert in numerous workflows  gain new skills and keep developing your professional career.

What You'll Be Doing

Performing weekly reviews sampled from the total volume of interactions with our customers.
Develop the quality of performance of Support teams.
Providing feedback to agents and team leaders and identifying root causes of the errors.
Delivering quality refresher sessions to the individuals who are struggling with the quality performance.
Analysing and identifying support needs on the frontline.
Carrying out any other ad-hoc duties as required by your Supervisor
Be flexible with responsibilities and have a positive attitude towards any changes to role  company/departmental objectives  priorities and targets.

What You'll Need

Great people skills
Passion for helping and supporting people
Great attention to details
Communication skills
Previous experience as quality analyst for customer support department
Independent time management and prioritisation of tasks.
Eager to challenge and develop yourself
Practical knowledge of Google Sheets  Forms  Slides will be a plus
Flawless English.

Our mission now is to help our customers improve their financial health  empower them to have more control  and promote financial cohesion across the communities in which we operate. Launching into 2021 with 15 million Personal customers and over half a million Business customers only reinforced our belief in the vast need across the world for better financial services.

What were looking forRevolut is being scaled up by people all around the world who share our vision. Were looking for people who align with our five core values: we believe that we Get it Done because we Think Deeper and are strongly rooted in the Dream Team. We Never Settle hence why we always Deliver Wow. You want to join a community of forward-thinking people - we are here for you. We believe in empowering our Revoluters in their work  giving them autonomy and ownership of what they do. We want everyone at Revolut to own their story and their successes - working with us means youre not just another cog in the machine.

The Benefits

Competitive salary
Excellent training and guidance from our team
Roll with a free Revolut Metal subscription
Private medical care
Daily meal allowance

Job Title:Global HR Analyst
Job Description:
Global HR Analyst

Ferring Pharmaceuticals  a specialty biopharmaceutical company with operations worldwide  is looking for a Global HR Analyst.



Your new company

Ferring Pharmaceuticals is a research-driven  specialty biopharmaceutical group committed to helping people around the world build families and live better lives. Headquartered in Saint-Prex  Switzerland  Ferring is a leader in reproductive medicine and womens health  and in specialty areas within gastroenterology and urology. Ferring has been developing treatments for mothers and babies for over 50 years and has a portfolio covering treatments from conception to birth. Founded in 1950  privately-owned Ferring now employs over 6 000 people worldwide  has its own operating subsidiaries in nearly 60 countries and markets its products in 110 countries. To learn more about Ferring or its products please visit www.ferring.com.



Your new role

Purpose:

The Global HR Analyst is responsible for identifying and assisting HRs in solving People & Culture-related challenges  providing insights and guiding HRs (who will in turn guide their business stakeholders) to understand people data. The role will analyse and evaluate data and reports  feeding back the findings to relevant HRs.

Your challenge at Ferring will be to engage the HR Community into relying on analytics findings to take decisions for a first time right. As member of an Agile team focused on HR systems  the Global HR Analyst will have the opportunity to build strong relationships with HR colleagues to define and understand strategic objectives  and develop meaningful and actionable workforce metrics to help drive workforce decisions.



Key Responsibilities:

Your deep understanding of the People & Culture world and challenges will enable you to collect and compile useful HR metrics and data from a variety of sources available in the HR systems  covering all domains of HR (recruiting  diversity  headcount  performance  compensation  learning  workforce planning...)

You will analyze data and statistics to identify trends and patterns and prepare results  presenting and explaining findings to senior leadership.

You will contribute to change management efforts by training HRs on how to use and interpret the existing reports and dashboards already available.

Most importantly  you will coach HRs on how to interpret patterns revealed by the data  to generate engagement and good habits. One of our team goals is to foster a data-driven mindset  you will play a key role in this!

As a guardian of HR data integrity  you will advocate for accuracy and consistency of data by performing audits and then coordinating the necessary remediation actions to troubleshoot irregularities and address root causes of poor data quality.

You will also play a role supporting data governance processes and maintaining the HR data glossary.

You will contribute to managing the HR reporting landscape and participate in the creation of new reports and dashboards within the Agile team dedicated to this topic.

You collaborate with the HR COEs and leadership to identify and recommends reasonable short- and long-term goals  milestones  and benchmarks for key performance metrics that you will keep up-to-date.

Finally  you will contribute to the elaboration of the business case for the creation of a BI tool that will enable HR to merge data together from different sources and participate in the set up of its governance model.




Required Education/Qualifications/Skills:

Bachelors in HR is preferred; a related field like Business  Information Sciences is acceptable too.

Masters degree is preferred but not required.

Proficiency in business English is a must.

3 years of relevant HR  HRIS and/or data analytics experience. The exact number of years is not as important as the type of experience youve gained. Here are examples of what we are looking for:

A solid understanding of the employee life cycle and basic HR processes.

Experience modelling workforce trends and analytics  including the utilization of various forms of data analysis (Statistical modelling and descriptive statistics would be a plus).

Experience creating dashboards  scorecards to display analysis of programme or process effectiveness  and overall trend analysis.

Expert in MS Excel.

Experience with using BI and/or Workday is a plus  experience with other HRIS solutions will be an advantage (PeopleSoft  SAP SuccessFactors  ) as the knowledge of how HR systems are configured and maintained is transferrable between solutions.




What you'll get in return
Inspiration from our commitment to advocate for everyones right to build a family  no matter who you are  where you live or who you love. Motivation from innovation in our chosen therapy areas and ongoing development of our organization.

What you need to do
If you're interested in this role  please apply now.

Location:Ferring Service Center Portugal
